original: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang /

translated: the noble eightfold path, the ten powers, the fearlessnesses, the detailed and thorough knowledges, the distinct attributes of a buddha, the aggregates, the constituents, and the sense fields

translated: The word-meaning of the Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Awakened One’s ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind is non-existent and non-apprehensible.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, the word-meaning of the bodhisattva is non-existent and non-apprehensible in the perfection of wisdom of a bodhisattva-mahāsattva.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The meaning of the word “bodhisattva” is non-apprehensible in the perfection of wisdom of bodhisattva great beings practicing the emptiness of internal phenomena, up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Subhūti, the meaning of the word “bodhisattva” is non-apprehensible in the perfection of wisdom of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
translated: The meaning of the word “bodhisattva” is non-apprehensible in the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening, the ten tathāgata powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha of the tathāgatas, worthy ones, perfectly complete buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The meaning of the word ‘bodhisattva’ is non-existent and non-apprehensible in the eighteen special qualities of the Buddha.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, the meaning of the word ‘bodhisattva’ is non-existent and non-apprehensible in a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings la 'dus byas kyi khams kyi gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings la 'dus byas kyi khams kyi gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The element of conditioned phenomena has no place and is non-apprehensible in the unconditioned element.

original: 'dus byas kyi khams la 'dus ma byas kyi @178b dbyings kyi gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'dus byas kyi khams la 'dus ma byas kyi @178b dbyings kyi gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The unconditioned element has no place and is non-apprehensible in the element of conditioned phenomena.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam gyi rten bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam gyi rten bstan pa yin no //
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, the meaning of the word ‘bodhisattva’ is non-existent and non-apprehensible in a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom.” This is the teaching on the support of the path of seeing.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: skye ba med pa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: skye ba med pa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The meaning of the words non-arising does not exist and is not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, for a bodhisattva-mahāsattva practicing the perfection of wisdom, the meaning of the words 'bodhisattva' does not exist and is not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mi dmigs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mi dmigs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The meaning of the words non-cessation, unconditioned, non-arising, non-apprehension, and non-affliction do not exist and are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, for a bodhisattva-mahāsattva practicing the perfection of wisdom, the meaning of the words 'bodhisattva' does not exist and is not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The meaning of the word ‘purification’ does not exist and is not found.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Subhūti, in the same way, the meaning of the word ‘bodhisattva’ does not exist and is not found in the bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor gzugs kyi skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor gzugs kyi skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Subhūti, the meaning of the word ‘arising’ does not exist and is not found in form.

original: rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Subhūti, the meaning of the word ‘arising’ does not exist and is not found in feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor gzugs kyi 'gag pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa dang / 'byung ba dang / dmigs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor gzugs kyi 'gag pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa dang / 'byung ba dang / dmigs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Subhūti, the meaning of the word ‘cessation,’ ‘origination,’ ‘arising,’ ‘sign,’ and ‘affliction’ does not exist and is not found in form.

original: rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa dang mngon par 'du byed pa dang 'byung ba dang dmigs pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa dang mngon par 'du byed pa dang 'byung ba dang dmigs pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: “Subhūti, the cessation, the production, the designation, the arising, the objective support, and the defilement of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness do not exist and are not apprehended as a referential object.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rab 'byor gzugs kyi rnam par byang ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //🔽rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed @179a * //
analyzed: rab 'byor gzugs kyi rnam par byang ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so // rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed @179a * //
translated: Subhūti, the purification of form does not exist and is not apprehended as a referential object.

original: rnams dang rnam par shes pa'i rnam par byang ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnams dang rnam par shes pa'i rnam par byang ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Subhūti, the purification of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness does not exist and is not apprehended as a referential object.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Subhūti, just as the referential object of the word ‘bodhisattva’ does not exist and is not apprehended in the perfection of wisdom,

original: rab 'byor gzugs kyi skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor gzugs kyi skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Subhūti, the arising of form does not exist and is not apprehended as a referential object.

original: gzugs kyi 'gag pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa dang / 'byung ba dang / dmigs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: gzugs kyi 'gag pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa dang / 'byung ba dang / dmigs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The cessation, the conditioning, the arising, the objective support, the defilement, and the purification of form are without significance and are non-apprehensible as verbal expressions.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The arising of feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are without significance and are non-apprehensible as verbal expressions.

original: rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa dang / 'byung ba dang / dmigs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa dang / mngon par 'du byed pa dang / 'byung ba dang / dmigs pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The cessation, the conditioning, the arising, the objective support, the defilement, and the purification of consciousness are without significance and are non-apprehensible as verbal expressions.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The arising of the constituents, the sense fields, and dependent origination are without significance and are non-apprehensible as verbal expressions.

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rnam par byang ba'i bar la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rnam par byang ba'i bar la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: up to the purification of the sense spheres, elements, and dependent origination, there is no meaning of words and no apprehension.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
translated: up to the factors of awakening, the concentrations, the immeasurables, the formless absorptions, the superknowledges, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses,

original: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha, there is no meaning of words and no apprehension in the arising of the distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rnam par byang ba'i bar la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rnam par byang ba'i bar la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Similarly, up to the purification of the distinct attributes of a buddha, there is no meaning of words and no apprehension.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: In the same way, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great being’s words bodhisattva do not exist and are not apprehended in the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: “Subhūti, it is like this:

original: shin tu dben pa'i phyir gzugs la mtshan ma'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: shin tu dben pa'i phyir gzugs la mtshan ma'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: a basis for signs in form does not exist and is not apprehended because of being utterly isolated.

original: shin tu dben pa'i phyir tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la @179b mtshan ma'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so //

translated: A basis for signs in feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness does not exist and is not apprehended because of being utterly isolated.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: In the same way, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great being’s words bodhisattva do not exist and are not apprehended in the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: “Subhūti, it is like this:

original: shin tu dben pa'i phyir /
analyzed: shin tu dben pa'i phyir /
translated: because of being utterly isolated,

original: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba so so ba dang / bsdus pa rnams la mtshan ma'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba so so ba dang / bsdus pa rnams la mtshan ma'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the sense-spheres, the elements, the dependent origination, either individually or collectively, are not a basis for signs, and are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Just so, Subhūti, the meaning of the word ‘bodhisattva’ in a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom is not a basis for signs, and is not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the four applications of mindfulness, which are extremely pure, are not a basis for signs, and are not apprehended.

original: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Just so, Subhūti, the meaning of the word ‘bodhisattva’ in a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom is not a basis for signs, and is not apprehended.

original: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang /
analyzed: de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang /
translated: Similarly, the right efforts, legs of miraculous power, faculties, powers, limbs of awakening, noble eightfold path, noble truths, concentrations,

analyzed: tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa la gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: immeasurables, formless absorptions, clairvoyances, ten powers of the tathāgatas, four fearlessnesses, four detailed and thorough knowledges, and eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not existent and are not apprehended in the purity of the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Subhūti, similarly, the meaning of the word bodhisattva in a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom is not existent and is not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: bdag med pa'i phyir bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa la gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bdag med pa'i phyir bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa la gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of a self, the extreme purity of a self is not a location and is not apprehended.

original: sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir /🔽sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba @180a * //
analyzed: sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir / sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba @180a * //
translated: Because of the nonexistence of a sentient being, a living being, a creature, a nourished being, one born of Manu, a human, a human being, one who does, one who feels, one who knows, and one who sees,

original: dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa la gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa la gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the extreme purity of a sentient being, a living being, a creature, a nourished being, one born of Manu, a human, a human being, one who does, one who feels, one who knows, and one who sees is not a location and is not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi rten yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi rten yin no //
translated: This is the support of the path of cultivation.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mngon par 'char ba'i 'od la mun pa'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mngon par 'char ba'i 'od la mun pa'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: In the light of the sun’s orb shining forth, there is no place for darkness, and it is not observed.🔽In the same way, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom does not see or observe the meaning of the word ‘bodhisattva.’

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni gnyen po'i phyogs kyi rten yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni gnyen po'i phyogs kyi rten yin no //
translated: This is the support of the antidote.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: bskal pa'i me 'bar ba'i tshe /
analyzed: bskal pa'i me 'bar ba'i tshe /
translated: When the fire of the eon blazes forth,

original: 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: there is no place for any kind of compositional activity, and it is not observed.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs spong ba'i rten yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs spong ba'i rten yin no //
translated: This is the basis for the elimination of the counteragent.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: “Subhūti, it is like this:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la tshul khrims ngan pa'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la tshul khrims ngan pa'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: In the Tathāgata, worthy one, perfectly complete Buddha’s morality, the state of immorality does not exist and is not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: In the same way, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great being’s words bodhisattva do not exist and are not apprehended in the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: “Subhūti, it is like this:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la rnam par g-yeng ba'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la rnam par g-yeng ba'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Awakened One has no basis in and does not apprehend distraction in samādhi.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Similarly, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom has no basis in and does not apprehend the meaning of the word bodhisattva.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi @180b shes rab la shes rab 'chal ba'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi @180b shes rab la shes rab 'chal ba'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: The Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Awakened One has no basis in and does not apprehend bad wisdom in wisdom.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Similarly, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom has no basis in and does not apprehend the meaning of the word bodhisattva.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: Subhūti, it is like this:

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba la rnam par ma grol ba'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba la rnam par ma grol ba'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: In the liberation of the Tathagata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One, there is no basis for non-liberation, and it is not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: Just so, Subhuti, in the Bodhisattva-course of the Bodhisattva, the great being, who courses in the perfection of wisdom, there is no basis for the word 'Bodhisattva', and it is not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: Subhuti: It is wonderful, O Lord, how far removed from the world of the gods, of men, and of the Asuras this perfection of wisdom is, and how superior it is to the world with its gods, men and Asuras!

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ma gzigs pa'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so//
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes ma gzigs pa'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so//
translated: In the vision of the knowledge of liberation of the Tathagata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One, there is no basis for the vision of the knowledge of non-liberation, and it is not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni gnyen po dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam par rtog
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni gnyen po dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam par rtog
translated: In the same way, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great being’s bodhisattva words have no object and are not apprehended.

original: pa spong ba'i rten yin no //
analyzed: pa spong ba'i rten yin no //
translated: This is the basis for the elimination of the conceptualization of the antidote and the counteragent.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: “Subhūti, it is like this:

original: nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od la gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od la gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the light of the sun and moon have no basis and are not apprehended.🔽In the same way, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great being’s bodhisattva words have no object and are not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni shes rab dang snying rje'i rten yin no //
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni shes rab dang snying rje'i rten yin no //
translated: This is the basis of wisdom and compassion.

original: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: “Subhūti, it is like this:

analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / gza' dang / skar ma dang / nor bu rin po che dang / glog gi 'od la gnas med cing mi dmigs so //
translated: the precious jewels,🔽and the light of the lightning.🔽In the same way, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great being’s words bodhisattva do not exist and are not apprehended in the perfection of wisdom.”

original: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa'i yon tan gyi rten yin no
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa'i yon tan gyi rten yin no
translated: This is the support for the uncommon qualities.

original: // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: “Subhūti, it is like this:

analyzed: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med cing mi dmigs so //

original: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha @181a * //
analyzed: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha @181a * //
translated: The light of the Trāyastriṃśa gods

translated: and the gods of the class of the Four Great Kings, the gods of the Thirty-Three, the Yāma gods, the Tuṣita gods, the Nirmāṇarati gods, the Paranirmitavaśavartin gods, the gods of Brahma’s Realm, the gods who are attendants on Brahma, the gods who are in Brahma’s retinue, the gods who are in great Brahma’s realm, up to the Akaniṣṭha gods, the light does not stand or exist anywhere.
