original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi don du go cha chen po gyon to //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi don du go cha chen po gyon to //
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva dons the great armor for the sake of all beings.

original: de 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: de 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: He thinks like this:

original: bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: “I must complete the perfection of generosity.

original: sems can 'di dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can 'di dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: I must connect these beings to the perfection of generosity.

original: bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
analyzed: bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o //
translated: I must complete the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom.

original: sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: I must connect all beings to the perfection of wisdom.”

original: de bzhin du bdag gis kyang @190b byang chub kyi chos rnams dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom par bya /
analyzed: de bzhin du bdag gis kyang @190b byang chub kyi chos rnams dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom par bya /
translated: the concentrations, the immeasurables, and the formless absorptions,

original: gzhan yang de dag la dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang de dag la dgod par bya'o //
translated: and I should also establish others in them.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par bya'o //
translated: I should abide in the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.

original: sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed do //
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed do //
translated: I should connect all sentient beings to the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.’🔽Venerable Śāriputra, that is the extent to which bodhisattva great beings are said to have donned the great armor.”

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos ba zhes bya ba ni bsgrub pa'i rang gi ngo bo yin no /🔽// bam po bcu bzhi pa /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos ba zhes bya ba ni bsgrub pa'i rang gi ngo bo yin no /🔽// bam po bcu bzhi pa /
translated: This is the nature of the accomplishment.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yongs su gtong ste /
analyzed: sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yongs su gtong ste /
translated: they give whatever gifts they give with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste /
translated: They make those wholesome roots common to all sentient beings and dedicate them to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o //
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o //
translated: This is the armor of the perfection of giving of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom and giving gifts.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing /
translated: they give gifts with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects.

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis yid la byed pa spong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis yid la byed pa spong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o /
translated: This is the armor of the perfection of morality of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom while giving gifts, rejecting attention to śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: sbyin pa gtong ba na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos de dag la brjod pa dang / mos pa dang / rtog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /🔽sbyin pa @191a * //
analyzed: sbyin pa gtong ba na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos de dag la brjod pa dang / mos pa dang / rtog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa @191a * //
translated: When giving a gift, with attention connected with the knowledge of all modes, he should express, believe in, and understand those dharmas.

original: yongs su gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o //
analyzed: yongs su gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o //
translated: This is the armour of the perfection of patience of a Bodhisattva who courses in the perfection of wisdom and gives a gift.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Furthermore, Subhuti, a Bodhisattva, a great being, who courses in the perfection of wisdom,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas /
translated: with attention connected with the knowledge of all modes,

original: brtson 'grus mi gtong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus mi gtong ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o //
translated: This non-abandonment of striving is the armor of the perfection of striving of a bodhisattva mahāsattva who practices the perfection of wisdom and gives gifts.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, when bodhisattva mahāsattvas practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba na 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing de la dmigs pa gcig pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go
analyzed: sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba na 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing de la dmigs pa gcig pas nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go
translated: When they give a gift, they do so with a one-pointed mind, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, and they do not open the way for the arousing of thoughts connected with śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas. This is the armor of the perfection of concentration of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom when they give a gift.

original: cha'o // tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe /
analyzed: cha'o // tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshe /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom give a gift,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te /
translated: the perception that all phenomena are like a magical creation connected with the knowledge of all aspects is present to them.

original: sbyin pa po yang mi dmigs /
analyzed: sbyin pa po yang mi dmigs /
translated: the giver is not apprehended,

original: len pa po yang mi dmigs /
analyzed: len pa po yang mi dmigs /
translated: the receiver is not apprehended,🔽and the gift is not apprehended.

original: sbyin par bya ba yang mi dmigs pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o //
analyzed: sbyin par bya ba yang mi dmigs pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o //
translated: This is the armor of the perfection of wisdom of a bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom and giving gifts.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la mtshan mar mi byed cing mi dmigs pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la mtshan mar mi byed cing mi dmigs pa de'i tshe /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, when bodhisattva great beings with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects do not take those perfections as signs and do not apprehend them,🔽then it should be known that bodhisattva great beings are wearing the great armor of practicing the perfection of wisdom.”

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i go cha chen po bgos par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po'i go cha ste dang po'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa'i go cha chen po bgos par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po'i go cha ste dang po'o //
translated: This is the armor of the six perfections of generosity.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan @191b yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de🔽dag sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan @191b yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of morality give any gifts at all,

original: spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: they dedicate them to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, making common cause with all sentient beings, by way of not apprehending anything. This is the perfection of giving of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of morality.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of morality with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang mos pa mi bskyed na /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang mos pa mi bskyed na /
translated: do not even aspire to the śrāvaka and pratyekabuddha levels,

original: so so'i skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa 'di ni /
analyzed: so so'i skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa 'di ni /
translated: so what need is there to mention the level of ordinary people?

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of morality of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of morality.

translated: This acceptance, faith, and understanding of those dharmas is the perfection of patience of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of morality.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe /

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs @193b rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs @193b rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of patience do not do so with attention connected with śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: “When they practice the perfection of perseverance with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects,

original: sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed cing /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed cing /
translated: and for the sake of all beings do not let their perseverance decline,

original: brtun mi 'das pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: brtun mi 'das pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: and do not let their perseverance be interrupted, this is the perfection of perseverance of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of perseverance.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi /
translated: “Furthermore, Venerable Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings do not with attention connected with śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni /
translated: but with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, make their minds one-pointed.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of concentration of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of perseverance.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, when bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of perseverance

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi /
translated: cultivate the perfection of wisdom, they do not do so with attention connected with śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te /
translated: Rather, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, the perception of all phenomena as created by a magician is present.

original: brtson 'grus des rlom sems su mi byed cing /
analyzed: brtson 'grus des rlom sems su mi byed cing /
translated: They do not falsely project that perseverance.

original: brtson 'grus de yang mi dmigs te /
analyzed: brtson 'grus de yang mi dmigs te /
translated: They do not apprehend that perseverance.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /
translated: They make that wholesome root common to all beings.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni /
translated: This dedication to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: is the perfection of wisdom of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of perseverance.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings practicing like that the perfection of perseverance

original: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te /
analyzed: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te /
translated: take hold of all the six perfections.🔽Therefore they are called ‘those who have put on the great armor.’

original: de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po'i go cha ste bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po'i go cha ste bzhi pa'o //
translated: This is the armor of the six perfections of perseverance, the fourth.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: “Furthermore, Venerable Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of concentration

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la @194a * //
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la @194a * //
translated: the listeners and solitary realizers,🔽

original: bya bas ma yin gyi /
analyzed: bya bas ma yin gyi /
translated: not with the attention of śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
translated: but with the attention associated with the knowledge of all aspects,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni /
translated: and dedicates that wholesome action to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: this is the perfection of giving of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of concentration.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of concentration

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi /
translated: do not with the attention of śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims bsrung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims bsrung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
translated: He should guard morality with attention connected with the knowledge of all modes, and he should share the root of virtue with all beings.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni /
translated: He should dedicate it to full enlightenment.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of morality of the Bodhisattva, the great being, who courses in the perfection of meditation.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /

analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi /

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa yongs su bsgom ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa yongs su bsgom ste /
translated: but one who is endowed with attention connected with the knowledge of all modes.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /
translated: They should dedicate the roots of virtue to all sentient beings.

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni /
translated: He makes common cause with all sentient beings and dedicates it to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

translated: This is the perfection of patience of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of concentration.

analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of concentration with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, not with attention connected with śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas,

analyzed: brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed de /

analyzed: de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
translated: They make common cause with all sentient beings and dedicate those wholesome roots

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di @194b ni /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di @194b ni /
translated: and dedicates it to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /

analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par byed na /

analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi /
