analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni /
translated: and dedicate it to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽This is the perfection of morality of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom.”

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom, when they are abused, reviled, censured, quarreled with, and hurt,🔽do not get angry, do not get irritated, do not get enraged, do not get resentful, and do not get hostile.🔽They think, ‘Who is abusing me, reviling me, censuring me, quarreling with me, and hurting me?

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi /
translated: do not do so with attention connected with śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos de dag la de ltar bzod la mos shing rtog pa ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos de dag la de ltar bzod la mos shing rtog pa ste /
translated: but with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they are patient with and believe in those dharmas and investigate them.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /
translated: They also make those wholesome roots into something shared in common by all beings

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni /
translated: and dedicate them to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽This is the perfection of patience of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom.”

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom, having stood in the perfection of patience,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi /
translated: do not slacken their effort, not with attention connected with śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas,🔽but with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects.🔽And they make that wholesome root into something shared in common by all beings🔽and dedicate it to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.🔽This is the perfection of effort of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom.”🔽“Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom, having stood in the perfection of concentration,🔽do not slacken their effort, not with attention connected with śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed cing /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed cing /
translated: but with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du @195b byas nas /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du @195b byas nas /
translated: And they make that wholesome root into something shared in common by all beings

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni /
translated: and dedicate it to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of concentration of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom.”

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi /
analyzed: nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi /
translated: do not do so with attention connected with śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te /
translated: but with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects they make their minds one-pointed, and they make common cause with all sentient beings with that wholesome root,

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni /
translated: and they dedicate it to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of concentration of bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom.”

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, when bodhisattva great beings practice the perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par byed de /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par byed de /
translated: they cultivate the perfection of wisdom.

original: de yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi /
analyzed: de yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi /
translated: And that is not with attention associated with śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / chos thams cad la sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / brag ca dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur la /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang / chos thams cad la sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / brag ca dang / gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur la /
translated: but with attention associated with the knowledge of all aspects, the perception of all dharmas as like an illusion, a dream, an optical illusion, an echo, a reflected image, and a magical creation remains present.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing /
translated: And they make that wholesome root common to all beings

original: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni /
analyzed: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni /
translated: and dedicate it to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: This is the perfection of wisdom of the bodhisattva great being practicing the perfection of wisdom.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag dang / sems can dang / byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, when bodhisattva great beings with a thought endowed with the knowledge of all aspects do not take the six perfections, beings, and awakening as signs,

original: mi dmigs pa de ltar na /
analyzed: mi dmigs pa de ltar na /
translated: and do not apprehend them,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
translated: then, Venerable Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: go cha chen po bgos par 'gyur ba yin no //🔽tshe dang @196a * //
analyzed: go cha chen po bgos par 'gyur ba yin no // tshe dang @196a * //
translated: are said to be wearing the great armor.🔽Venerable Śāriputra,

original: ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de ltar na /
analyzed: ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de ltar na /
translated: in that way,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re res gnas nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa'i go cha ste drug pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa re res gnas nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa'i go cha ste drug pa'o //
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva who abides in each perfection brings the six perfections to completion.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug par byed kyang bsam gtan rnams kyi ro myong bar mi byed /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug par byed kyang bsam gtan rnams kyi ro myong bar mi byed /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, the bodhisattva mahāsattva who enters into the meditative concentrations does not experience the taste of the meditative concentrations.

original: de dag gis 'phrog par yang mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: de dag gis 'phrog par yang mi 'gyur te /
translated: He is not carried away by them.

original: de dag gi dbang gis skye ba yang ma yin /
analyzed: de dag gi dbang gis skye ba yang ma yin /
translated: He is not reborn under their sway.

original: de bzhin du tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par byed kyang de dag gi ro myong bar mi byed /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par byed kyang de dag gi ro myong bar mi byed /
translated: Similarly, he enters into the formless absorptions but does not experience the taste of them.

original: de dag gis 'phrog par yang mi 'gyur /
analyzed: de dag gis 'phrog par yang mi 'gyur /
translated: He is not carried away by them.

original: de dag gi dbang gis skye ba yang ma yin pa 'di ni /
analyzed: de dag gi dbang gis skye ba yang ma yin pa 'di ni /
translated: He is not reborn under their sway.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu tu phyin pa dang ldan par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu tu phyin pa dang ldan par rig par bya'o //
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, you should know that bodhisattva great beings who have the perfection of wisdom endowed with skillful means are endowed with the perfection of wisdom.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mthong bas gnas kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' sngon du byed pa ma yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po ste /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mthong bas gnas kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' sngon du byed pa ma yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po ste /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings who, while abiding in the concentrations, immeasurables, and formless absorptions, see emptiness, signlessness, and wishlessness, but do not make the very limit of reality prior, are practicing the perfection of wisdom of bodhisattva great beings.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa des na sems dpa' chen po zhes brjod do //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa des na sems dpa' chen po zhes brjod do //
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings who are thus armored with the great armor of skillful means are called ‘great beings.’

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha chen po bgos pa la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha chen po bgos pa la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing /
translated: The Blessed Buddhas of the ten directions proclaim the name of the bodhisattva mahāsattva who is thus clad in the great armor,

original: ming yongs su sgrogs par mdzad de /🔽'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na /
analyzed: ming yongs su sgrogs par mdzad de / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na /
translated: and they utter cries of joy.🔽They proclaim: In such and such a world system,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: a bodhisattva mahāsattva clad in the great armor is ripening beings,

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do //🔽rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go zhes bya ba ni drug @196b pa'i go cha'i mjug bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do // rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go zhes bya ba ni drug @196b pa'i go cha'i mjug bsdu ba'o //
translated: purifying the buddhafield,🔽and playing with his magical powers.🔽 This is the conclusion of the sixth chapter on the armor.

original: go cha'i sgrub pa bstan zin to /
analyzed: go cha'i sgrub pa bstan zin to /
translated: The teaching on the accomplishment of the armor has been completed.

original: // / sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: // / sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
translated: Śāriputra said:

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na /
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, to what extent

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par 'jug pa dang / theg pa chen po la 'dzeg par 'gyur ba yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par 'jug pa dang / theg pa chen po la 'dzeg par 'gyur ba yin /
translated: the bodhisattva mahāsattva who has set out in the Great Vehicle, who is mounted on the Great Vehicle.

original: gang pos smras pa /
analyzed: gang pos smras pa /
translated: Pūrṇa said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dod pas dben pa sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dod pas dben pa sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, here bodhisattva mahāsattvas practicing the perfection of generosity, isolated from desire, isolated from negative and nonvirtuous factors, endowed with investigation and analysis,

original: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: dwell having attained and remained in the first concentration that has both joy and happiness born of isolation.

original: de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
analyzed: de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so //
translated: Similarly, they dwell having attained and remained in the second concentration, the third concentration, and the fourth concentration.

original: de bzhin du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa ste /
translated: Similarly, he enters the sphere of infinite space, the sphere of infinite consciousness, the sphere of nothingness, and the sphere of neither perception nor non-perception.

original: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'o //
translated: These are the bodhisattva-mahāsattva's dhyānas and formless [absorptions].

original: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad pa na /
translated: When the bodhisattva-mahāsattva practices the perfection of generosity through these dhyānas and formless [absorptions],

original: nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan mas mnyam par 'jog cing ldang ba na dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa 'di ni /
analyzed: nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan mas mnyam par 'jog cing ldang ba na dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa 'di ni /
translated: he enters meditative absorption through the aspects, signs, and characteristics of space. When he arises [from absorption], he dedicates that root of virtue to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of generosity of bodhisattva great beings.

original: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang brjod par bya'o //
translated: The perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, and the perfection of concentration should be described in the same way.

original: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni /
translated: “Moreover, Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings practicing the perfection of wisdom

original: bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par 'jug par byed /
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par 'jug par byed /
translated: enter into the four concentrations,

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug par byed /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug par byed /
translated: and also enter into the four formless absorptions.

original: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / @197a * //
analyzed: gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang / @197a * //
translated: When bodhisattva great beings stand in these concentrations

original: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag gis gnas shing /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag gis gnas shing /
translated: and these formless absorptions,

original: de bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa na /🔽nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma yid la byed pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas /
analyzed: de bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa na / nam mkha'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma yid la byed pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas /
translated: When they are absorbed in these concentrations and formless absorptions,

original: sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa 'di ni /
analyzed: sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa 'di ni /
translated: they practice the perfection of wisdom by keeping in mind the aspects, the signs, and the essential nature of space, and they dedicate the wholesome roots to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, and they share them with all sentient beings.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of wisdom of bodhisattva great beings.

original: sh'a ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni /
translated: Śāriputra, in the same way, bodhisattva great beings practicing the six perfections

original: theg pa chen po la rab tu zhugs pa yin no //
analyzed: theg pa chen po la rab tu zhugs pa yin no //
translated: are engaged in the Great Vehicle.

original: sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: and they also bring beings to maturity.🔽and they also purify a buddhafield.”

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i 'jug pa yin no //
translated: This is the engagement in the meditative stability and formless absorptions.

original: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu spang pa'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu spang pa'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni /
translated: “Moreover, Śāriputra, when bodhisattva great beings with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects think, ‘I should teach the Dharma in order to eliminate the defilements of all beings,’

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: this is the bodhisattva great beings’ perfection of generosity.

original: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag gis bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba yang 'di lta ste /
analyzed: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag gis bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par gzhog cing rnam par ldang ba yang 'di lta ste /
translated: they do not open the way for any other thought

original: nyan thos sam /
analyzed: nyan thos sam /
translated: of the śrāvakas or

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam /
translated: pratyekabuddhas.

original: sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'o //
analyzed: sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ perfection of morality that is not held as paramount.

original: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i @197b snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis gnas pa na 'di snyam ste /
analyzed: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i @197b snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis gnas pa na 'di snyam ste /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings, with those mental attentions associated with the knowledge of all aspects, abide in those concentrations, immeasurables, and formless absorptions, they think,

original: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to snyam du sems shing yid la byed pa de dag la 'dod pa dang / bzod pa dang / nye bar rtog pa dang / rtogs pa dang / nges par sems par byed pa 'di ni /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to snyam du sems shing yid la byed pa de dag la 'dod pa dang / bzod pa dang / nye bar rtog pa dang / rtogs pa dang / nges par sems par byed pa 'di ni /
translated: They think and keep in mind, ‘I will teach the Dharma so as to extinguish the defilements of all sentient beings.’

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ perfection of patience.

original: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “When bodhisattva great beings, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, practice those concentrations, immeasurables, and formless absorptions,

original: sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir /
analyzed: sems can thams cad kyi don dang / phan pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir /
translated: for the sake of the benefit and welfare of all sentient beings and for the knowledge of all aspects,

original: brtson 'grus mi gtong pa 'di ni /
analyzed: brtson 'grus mi gtong pa 'di ni /
translated: they do not give up their effort.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of perseverance of bodhisattva great beings.

original: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang /
analyzed: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa la snyoms par 'jug kyang /
translated: “When bodhisattva great beings, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, enter into the meditative stabilizations and formless absorptions,

original: mi dmigs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: but do not apprehend them, this is the perfection of concentration of bodhisattva great beings.

original: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i yan lag rnams la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /
analyzed: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i yan lag rnams la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang /
translated: “When bodhisattva great beings, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, in the branches of the first concentration, the second concentration, the third concentration, and the fourth concentration, and in the formless absorptions, do not apprehend the aspects of impermanence,

original: sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtogs kyang /
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtogs kyang /
translated: the aspect of suffering, the aspect of selflessness, the aspect of peace, the aspect of emptiness, the aspect of signlessness, and the aspect of wishlessness.

original: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing de dag gis rlom sems su mi byed pa 'di ni /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing de dag gis rlom sems su mi byed pa 'di ni /
translated: They do not apprehend those meditative stabilities, immeasurables, and formless absorptions, and they do not falsely project them.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ perfection of wisdom.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi 'jug @198a * //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi 'jug @198a * //
translated: Venerable Śāriputra,🔽this is the Great Vehicle of bodhisattva great beings practicing the six perfections.”

original: pa yin no //
analyzed: pa yin no //
translated: This is the engagement with the six perfections.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, moreover,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po ni rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po ni rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
translated: The bodhisattva mahāsattva’s Mahāyāna is the cultivation of all the thirty-seven aspects of the factors for awakening, the cultivation of all the emptiness gate to liberation, the signlessness gate to liberation,

original: smon pa med pa sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom par byed pa 'di ni /
analyzed: smon pa med pa sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgom par byed pa 'di ni /
translated: and the wishlessness gate to liberation, and the cultivation of all the ten tathāgata powers, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha.🔽Venerable Śāriputra, this is the bodhisattva mahāsattva’s Mahāyāna.”

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i lam la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i lam la 'jug pa'o //
translated: This is the entry to the noble path.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, a bodhisattva great being, with a mind endowed with love,🔽vast,

original: rgya chen por gyur pa /🔽mi gnyis pa /
analyzed: rgya chen por gyur pa / mi gnyis pa /
translated: extensive,

original: tshad med pa /🔽kho na med pa /🔽'gran zla med pa /
analyzed: tshad med pa / kho na med pa / 'gran zla med pa /
translated: immeasurable,🔽unadulterated,🔽unrivaled,

original: sgrib pa med pa /
analyzed: sgrib pa med pa /
translated: unobstructed,

original: gnod pa med pa /🔽thams cad du song ba shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig gi 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
analyzed: gnod pa med pa / thams cad du song ba shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig gi 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
translated: harmless,🔽pervading the entire world,

original: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten khyab par byas shing /
analyzed: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten khyab par byas shing /
translated: having made it pervade the entire world system of the great trichiliocosm,

original: nye bar bsgrubs nas gnas pa nas /
analyzed: nye bar bsgrubs nas gnas pa nas /
translated: having actualized it, abides in it.

original: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du khyab par byas shing nye bar bsgrubs nas gnas so //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du khyab par byas shing nye bar bsgrubs nas gnas so //
translated: Having made it pervade the world systems in the ten directions, having actualized it, he abides in it.🔽With a mind endowed with compassion,🔽with a mind endowed with joy,

original: de snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa /
analyzed: de snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa /
translated: with a mind endowed with equanimity, vast,🔽extensive,

original: rgya chen por gyur pa /
analyzed: rgya chen por gyur pa /
translated: immeasurable,🔽unadulterated,🔽unrivaled,🔽unobstructed,

original: mi gnyis pa /
analyzed: mi gnyis pa /
translated: harmless,🔽pervading the entire world,🔽having made it pervade the entire world system of the great trichiliocosm,🔽having actualized it, he abides in it.🔽Having made it pervade the world systems in the ten directions, having actualized it, he abides in it.

original: tshad med pa /🔽kho na med pa /🔽'gran zla med pa /
analyzed: tshad med pa / kho na med pa / 'gran zla med pa /
translated: immeasurable,🔽unrivaled,🔽unrivalled,

original: sgrib pa med pa /
analyzed: sgrib pa med pa /
translated: unobstructed,

original: gnod pa med pa /
analyzed: gnod pa med pa /
translated: harmless,

original: thams cad du song ba shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig gi 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
analyzed: thams cad du song ba shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig gi 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa /
translated: pervading all, well cultivated, in one direction, in the world realm of the realm of phenomena,🔽reaching to the end of space,

original: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten khyab par byas shing /
analyzed: nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten khyab par byas shing /
translated: having pervaded and accomplished the entire world system with its four continents,

original: nye bar bsgrubs nas gnas pa nas /
analyzed: nye bar bsgrubs nas gnas pa nas /
translated: he abides.

original: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi bar du khyab par byas shing nye bar bsgrubs nas gnas so //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi bar du khyab par byas shing nye bar bsgrubs nas gnas so //
translated: In the same way, he pervades and accomplishes the world systems in the ten directions, up to the worlds in the ten directions.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing bdag gis sems can thams @198b cad yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes de la gzhol bar byed /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing bdag gis sems can thams @198b cad yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes de la gzhol bar byed /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, moreover, the bodhisattva mahāsattva, while resting in the meditative absorption of loving kindness, directs his mind to the thought, “I must protect all sentient beings.”

original: snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam pa 'jog cing /
analyzed: snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam pa 'jog cing /
translated: He rests in the meditative absorption of compassion,

original: sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / snying brtse ba la gzhol bar byed /
analyzed: sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / snying brtse ba la gzhol bar byed /
translated: They are intent on compassion and loving kindness for sentient beings.

original: dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing /
analyzed: dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing /
translated: They rest in the meditative absorption of joy

original: bdag nyid kyis sems can dga' bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la gzhol bar byed /
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis sems can dga' bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la gzhol bar byed /
translated: and are intent on bringing joy to sentient beings, thinking, “I will bring joy to sentient beings.”

original: btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing /
analyzed: btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing /
translated: They rest in the meditative absorption of equanimity

original: sems can rnams zag pa zad pa la rab tu gzhol bar byed de /
analyzed: sems can rnams zag pa zad pa la rab tu gzhol bar byed de /
translated: and are intent on bringing sentient beings to the exhaustion of defilements.

original: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
analyzed: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
translated: This is the transcendent perfection of generosity of bodhisattva great beings practicing the four immeasurables.

original: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / rtags dang mtshan ma la mnyam par gzhog cing /
analyzed: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / rtags dang mtshan ma la mnyam par gzhog cing /
translated: “When bodhisattva great beings rest in the aspects, signs, and indications of the meditative concentrations and the immeasurables,

original: rnam par ldang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba 'di ni /
analyzed: rnam par ldang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba 'di ni /
translated: Even when they rise from those concentrations, they do not dedicate those wholesome roots to the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level, but only to the knowledge of all aspects.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of morality of bodhisattva great beings practicing the immeasurables, without taking anything as paramount.

original: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par rnam par spyod cing /🔽sa gnyis po nyan thos kyi sa'am /
analyzed: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par rnam par spyod cing / sa gnyis po nyan thos kyi sa'am /
translated: When bodhisattva great beings practice those concentrations, immeasurables, and formless absorptions without mixing them up,🔽and do not aspire to the two levels,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa mi bskyed kyi /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa mi bskyed kyi /
translated: the śrāvaka level or the pratyekabuddha level,

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bzod pa dang / 'dod pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bzod pa dang / 'dod pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: but only to the knowledge of all aspects, this is the perfection of patience of bodhisattva great beings practicing the immeasurables.

original: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don du brtson 'grus mi gtong bas rnam par spyod pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don du brtson 'grus mi gtong bas rnam par spyod pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: When Bodhisattva-Mahasattvas, with the mind generated towards omniscience, do not give up striving in order to abandon unwholesome dharmas and perfect wholesome dharmas, this is the perfection of effort of Bodhisattva-Mahasattvas practicing the immeasurables.

original: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par 'jog la /
analyzed: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par 'jog la /
translated: When Bodhisattva-Mahasattvas enter those concentrations, immeasurables, and formless absorptions,

original: @199a * // bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye zhing /
analyzed: @199a * // bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye zhing /
translated: but do not take birth due to the power of the concentrations, immeasurables, and formless absorptions,

original: de dag gi ro myong bar byed pa yang med la /
analyzed: de dag gi ro myong bar byed pa yang med la /
translated: and do not experience their taste,

original: de dag gis 'phrogs par yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni /
analyzed: de dag gis 'phrogs par yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni /
translated: They are not carried away by them.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of concentration of bodhisattva great beings practicing the immeasurables.

original: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par 'jog cing /
analyzed: nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par 'jog cing /
translated: “When bodhisattva great beings, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, rest in those concentrations, immeasurables, and formless absorptions,🔽and

original: rnam par ldang ba la /🔽de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang nyan thos dang /
analyzed: rnam par ldang ba la / de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang nyan thos dang /
translated: when they rise from them,

original: rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par 'jug par mi byed pa 'di ni /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par 'jug par mi byed pa 'di ni /
translated: they contemplate them as having the aspects of impermanence, suffering, no-self, and peace, and as having the aspects of emptiness, signlessness, and aspirationlessness, but they do not enter into the flawlessness of śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.🔽This is the perfection of wisdom of bodhisattva great beings practicing the immeasurables.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: This is the perfection of wisdom of the bodhisattva great beings practicing the immeasurables.🔽Venerable Śāriputra, this is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.”

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni tshad med pa la 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni tshad med pa la 'jug pa'o //
translated: This is the entry into the immeasurables.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, moreover, the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings

original: gang nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
analyzed: gang nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin /
translated: is the knowledge of inner emptiness but not by way of apprehending;🔽the knowledge of outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness,

original: phyi stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: phyi stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: and the knowledge of the emptiness of emptiness, the emptiness of great things, the emptiness of ultimate reality, the emptiness of the compounded and the emptiness of the uncompounded, the emptiness of what is beyond extremes, the emptiness of inherent existence, the emptiness of all things, the emptiness of intrinsic defining characteristics, the emptiness of nonobservation, the emptiness of essential nature, the emptiness of essential nature of nonthings, and the emptiness of the essential nature of nonexistence of things but not by way of apprehending;

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, this is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings is

original: chos thams cad la sems rnam par g-yeng ba med par mnyam par gzhag pa'i shes pa gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad la sems rnam par g-yeng ba med par mnyam par gzhag pa'i shes pa gang yin pa ste /
translated: the knowledge of resting in equipoise without a distracted mind regarding all phenomena.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, this is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.🔽“Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings is

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems @199b dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug / mi rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag dang /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems @199b dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug / mi rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag dang /
translated: the non-engagement of the knowledge that thinks, ‘It is permanent,’ ‘It is impermanent,’ ‘It is happiness,’ ‘It is suffering,’ ‘It is a self,’ ‘It is not a self,’ ‘It is attractive,’ or ‘It is repulsive.’

original: bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba zhes bya ba dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa dang / mtshan ma yod pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa yod pa dang / smon pa med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / ma zhi ba zhes bya ba dang / stong pa dang / mi stong pa dang / mtshan ma yod pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa yod pa dang / smon pa med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste /
translated: He does not engage in the knowledge that it is with or without self, with or without peace, with or without agitation, with or without emptiness, with or without characteristics, with or without aspirations.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, this is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang 'das pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dus la shes pa 'jug par mi byed de /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang 'das pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dus la shes pa 'jug par mi byed de /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings is that which does not engage in knowledge of the past, does not engage in knowledge of the future, and does not engage in knowledge of the present.

original: de gsum po 'di gsum la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes pa mi 'jug pa 'di ni /
analyzed: de gsum po 'di gsum la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes pa mi 'jug pa 'di ni /
translated: He does not engage in knowledge of these three without apprehending them.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, this is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed /
translated: Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings does not engage the mind in the desire realm,

original: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed de /
analyzed: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed de /
translated: nor does it engage the mind in the form and formless realms.

original: 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes pa 'jug pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o //🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang /
analyzed: 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes pa 'jug pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o // tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang /
translated: The engagement of the mind in the desire, form, and formless realms by way of not apprehending them is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: 'dus ma byas kyi chos la shes pa 'jug par mi byed de /
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi chos la shes pa 'jug par mi byed de /
translated: Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings does not engage the mind in mundane and supramundane phenomena, or in contaminated and uncontaminated phenomena, or in conditioned and unconditioned phenomena.🔽The engagement of the mind in mundane and supramundane phenomena, or in contaminated and uncontaminated phenomena, or in conditioned and unconditioned phenomena by way of not apprehending them is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings.

original: de 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mi shes pa yang med /
analyzed: de 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mi shes pa yang med /
translated: He does not not know mundane and supramundane dharmas.🔽He does not not know conditioned and unconditioned dharmas.

original: zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes pa mi 'jug pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa la sbyor ba'i 'jug pa'o //
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes pa mi 'jug pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa la sbyor ba'i 'jug pa'o //
translated: This is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva mahāsattva.”

original: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bus smras pa /
translated: Śāriputra said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na /🔽byang chub sems @200a * //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis na / byang chub sems @200a * //
translated: “Venerable Pūrṇa, to what extent

original: dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la zhugs pa zhes bya /
analyzed: dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la zhugs pa zhes bya /
translated: is a bodhisattva mahāsattva said to have set out in the Great Vehicle?”

original: gang pos smras pa /
analyzed: gang pos smras pa /
translated: Pūrṇa said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: “Venerable Śāriputra, here bodhisattva mahāsattvas, when practicing the perfection of wisdom,

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dzeg kyang /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dzeg kyang /
translated: ascend the perfection of generosity,

original: des sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs te /
analyzed: des sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs te /
translated: He does not apprehend the perfection of giving,

original: sbyin pa po dang / len pa po dang / sbyin pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dmigs su med pa de lta na tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sbyin pa po dang / len pa po dang / sbyin pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dmigs su med pa de lta na tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o //
translated: because he does not apprehend a giver, a recipient, or the giving, and so on up to:

original: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /🔽tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dzeg kyang de mi dmigs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
analyzed: de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dzeg kyang de mi dmigs pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe /
translated: in the same way, when he practices the perfection of wisdom,

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dzeg kyang des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dzeg kyang des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs /
translated: he mounts the perfection of morality, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, and the perfection of concentration, but he does not apprehend them, and he mounts the perfection of wisdom, but he does not apprehend the perfection of wisdom,

original: byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs /
translated: he does not apprehend a bodhisattva,

original: yid la byed pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dmigs su med pa de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
analyzed: yid la byed pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dmigs su med pa de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu /
translated: “Attentiveness” is not an object of attention, because it is not an object of attention.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa la 'jug pa'o //🔽tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas sgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i don du /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa la 'jug pa'o // tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas sgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i don du /
translated: Venerable Śāriputra, in this way the bodhisattva mahāsattvas are said to be mounted on the Great Vehicle.

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom par byed de /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom par byed de /
translated: “Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, bodhisattva mahāsattvas, with unadulterated attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, cultivate the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening in order to destroy the object of meditation.🔽They cultivate them without apprehending anything.

original: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o //
translated: In this way, Śāriputra, the bodhisattva mahāsattvas are said to be mounted on the Great Vehicle.”

original: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa ma 'dres pas sgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i don du stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /🔽smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom par byed de /
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa ma 'dres pas sgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i don du stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom par byed de /
translated: “Moreover, Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, cultivate the four fearlessnesses for the sake of destroying cultivation, and they do so without apprehending anything.🔽“Moreover, Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, cultivate the four detailed and thorough knowledges for the sake of destroying cultivation, and they do so without apprehending anything.🔽“Moreover, Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, cultivate the four detailed and thorough knowledges for the sake of destroying cultivation, and they do so without apprehending anything.

original: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar na /🔽byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @200b theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar na / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po @200b theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o //
translated: “Moreover, Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, cultivate the four fearlessnesses for the sake of destroying cultivation, and they do so without apprehending anything.🔽“Moreover, Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, cultivate the four detailed and thorough knowledges for the sake of destroying cultivation, and they do so without apprehending anything.🔽“Moreover, Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, cultivate the four fearlessnesses for the sake of destroying cultivation, and they do so without apprehending anything.🔽“Moreover, Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, cultivate the four detailed and thorough knowledges for the sake of destroying cultivation, and they do so without apprehending anything.🔽“Moreover, Śāriputra, bodhisattva great beings, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, cultivate the four fearlessnesses for the sake of destroying cultivation, and they do so without apprehending anything.

original: sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas sgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /

analyzed: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom par byed de /
translated: He cultivates the four detailed and thorough knowledges and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha without apprehending anything.

analyzed: sh'a ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o //

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste /

original: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste /

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:🔽‘

original: rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o zhes bya bar de ltar shes so //

analyzed: skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir /

original: 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste /
analyzed: 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste /
translated: this is merely a conventional term—

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste /

analyzed: 'di lta ste /

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste /
translated: Because the perfection of ethical discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom are non-apprehensible, this is merely a conventional term—

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: namely,🔽the perfection of wisdom.”

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar shes so //
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar shes so //

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste /
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste /
translated: “The thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening are a mere convention, because the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening are non-apprehensible.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams zhes bya bar shes so //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag @201a * //
analyzed: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams zhes bya bar shes so // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag @201a * //

original: par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste /
analyzed: par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste /
translated: “The ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are a mere convention, because the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are non-apprehensible.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya bar shes so //

original: nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste /

original: 'di lta ste /

original: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste / 'di lta ste /

analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar shes so //

analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar shes so //

analyzed: de bzhin nyid ces bya bar shes so //

analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste /
translated: Moreover, Venerable Śāriputra, from the time when the bodhisattva great being first generates the thought,

translated: up to the time when he is seated at the site of awakening, he brings beings to maturity by perfecting all the superknowledges.🔽From buddhafield to buddhafield, he honors the blessed buddhas with the worship and reverence that are appropriate for them.

original: sangs rgyas @201b bcom ldan 'das rnams la bkur stir byed /

analyzed: mchod par byed do //

analyzed: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang chos nyan te /

analyzed: 'di lta ste /

analyzed: theg pa chen po 'di nyid do //

analyzed: de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de la 'dzegs nas /

original: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /
