original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de dag thams cad shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //🔽rab 'byor rmi lam ni mi byed mi 'gyur /🔽mngon @210a * //
analyzed: de dag thams cad shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro // rab 'byor rmi lam ni mi byed mi 'gyur / mngon @210a * //
translated: Because all of them are utterly non-apprehensible.

original: par 'du mi byed de /
analyzed: par 'du mi byed de /
translated: Subhūti, a dream does not make, does not become, and does not form.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is utterly non-apprehensible.

original: sgyu ma dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / smig rgyu dang / sprul pa ni mi byed mi 'gyur /
analyzed: sgyu ma dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / smig rgyu dang / sprul pa ni mi byed mi 'gyur /
translated: An illusion, an echo, an apparition, a reflection in the mirror, a mirage, and a magical creation do not make, do not become, and do not form.🔽Why is that?

original: mngon par 'du mi byed do //
analyzed: mngon par 'du mi byed do //
translated: Because they are utterly non-apprehensible.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //🔽rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni mi byed mi 'gyur /
analyzed: de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro // rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni mi byed mi 'gyur /
translated: it is because they are utterly non-apprehensible.

original: mngon par 'du mi byed do //🔽rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi byed mi 'gyur /
analyzed: mngon par 'du mi byed do // rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi byed mi 'gyur /
translated: “Subhūti, inner emptiness does not make anything, does not unmake anything, and does not occasion anything.

original: mngon par 'du mi byed de /
analyzed: mngon par 'du mi byed de /
translated: “Subhūti, up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature does not make anything, does not unmake anything, and does not occasion anything.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //🔽rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni mi byed mi 'gyur /
analyzed: de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro // rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni mi byed mi 'gyur /
translated: it is because they are utterly non-apprehensible.

original: mngon par 'du mi byed de /
analyzed: mngon par 'du mi byed de /
translated: “Subhūti, the thirty-seven aspects of enlightenment do not make anything, do not unmake anything, and do not occasion anything.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //🔽de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni mi byed mi 'gyur /
analyzed: de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro // de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni mi byed mi 'gyur /
translated: it is because they are utterly non-apprehensible.

original: mngon par 'du mi byed de /
analyzed: mngon par 'du mi byed de /
translated: “Subhūti, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four assurances, the four kinds of exact knowledge, and the eighteen distinct qualities of the buddhas do not make anything, do not unmake anything, and do not occasion anything.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is absolutely non-apprehensible.

original: rab 'byor de bzhin nyid ni mi byed mi 'gyur /
analyzed: rab 'byor de bzhin nyid ni mi byed mi 'gyur /
translated: Subhūti, suchness does not make or unmake,

original: mngon par 'du mi byed de /
analyzed: mngon par 'du mi byed de /
translated: and does not occasion anything.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is because it is absolutely non-apprehensible.

original: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos nges pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni mi byed mi 'gyur /
analyzed: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos nges pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ni mi byed mi 'gyur /
translated: The unmistaken real nature, the unaltered real nature, the perfect real nature, the dharma-constituent, the establishment of dharmas, the certification of dharmas, the very limit of reality, and the inconceivable element do not make or unmake,

original: mngon par 'du mi byed de /
analyzed: mngon par 'du mi byed de /
translated: and do not occasion anything.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is because they are absolutely non-apprehensible.

original: rab 'byor byang chub ni mi byed mi 'gyur /
analyzed: rab 'byor byang chub ni mi byed mi 'gyur /
translated: Subhūti, awakening does not make or unmake,

original: mngon par 'du mi byed de /
analyzed: mngon par 'du mi byed de /
translated: and does not occasion anything.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: If you ask why,

original: de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is because it is absolutely non-apprehensible.

original: rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mi byed mi 'gyur /
analyzed: rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mi byed mi 'gyur /
translated: Subhūti, the knowledge of all aspects does not make or unmake,

original: mngon par 'du mi byed de /
analyzed: mngon par 'du mi byed de /
translated: and does not occasion anything.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not apprehended.

original: rab 'byor rnam grangs des na 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de ma byas mi 'gyur mngon par 'du ma byas par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: rab 'byor rnam grangs des na 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de ma byas mi 'gyur mngon par 'du ma byas par rig par bya'o //
translated: Subhūti, for this reason you should know that thusness is not made, does not change, and is not fabricated.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas mi 'gyur mngon par 'dus ma byas par @210b rig par bya'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas mi 'gyur mngon par 'dus ma byas par @210b rig par bya'o //
translated: You should know that those sentient beings for whose sake the bodhisattva great beings don their great armor are not made, do not change, and are not fabricated.🔽Subhūti, thus the bodhisattva great beings who don the great armor are said to don the great armor of the armor that is not an armor.”

original: rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni go cha med pa'i go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni lhag mthong gi tshogs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni go cha med pa'i go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni lhag mthong gi tshogs so //
translated: This is the accumulation of profound insight.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te /
translated: He said, “Blessed One, I understand the meaning of what the Blessed One has said.

original: bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Blessed One, form is neither bound nor liberated.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol pa'o //
translated: Feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are neither bound nor liberated.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos /
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos /
translated: Then the venerable Pūrṇa Maitrāyaniputra

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so //
translated: said to the venerable Su­bhūti,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba yin nam /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba yin nam /
translated: “Venerable Su­bhūti, is physical form neither bound nor liberated?🔽Are feeling, perception, and volitional factors neither bound nor liberated?

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba yin nam /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba yin nam /
translated: Is consciousness neither bound nor liberated?

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa gang po de de bzhin no //
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa gang po de de bzhin no //
translated: ” He replied, “Venerable Pūrṇa, that is so!

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, physical form is neither bound nor liberated.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are neither bound nor liberated.

original: gang pos smras pa /
analyzed: gang pos smras pa /
translated: ” Pūrṇa said,

original: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzugs de gang yin /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzugs de gang yin /
translated: “Venerable Su­bhūti, what is that physical form which is neither bound nor liberated?

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i tshor pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa de gang yin /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i tshor pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa de gang yin /
translated: What is feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness that is neither bound nor liberated?

original: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa gang po rmi lam lta bu'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: smras pa / tshe dang ldan pa gang po rmi lam lta bu'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Śāriputra replied, “Venerable Pūrṇa, form that is like a dream is neither bound nor liberated.

original: rmi lam lta bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: rmi lam lta bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness that are like a dream are neither bound nor liberated.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du sgyu ma lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du sgyu ma lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, similarly, form that is like an illusion, like a mirage, like an apparition, like a reflection of the moon in water, like an echo, and like a magical creation is neither bound nor liberated.

original: sprul pa lta bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / sprul pa lta bu'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: sprul pa lta bu'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / sprul pa lta bu'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness that are like a magical creation are neither bound nor liberated.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'das pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'das pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, past form is neither bound nor liberated.

original: 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Past feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are neither bound nor liberated.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs @211a * //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs @211a * //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, future form

original: ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: is neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Future feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are neither bound nor liberated.🔽Venerable Pūrṇa, present form

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po da ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: is neither bound nor liberated.

original: da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Present feeling, perception, volitional formations, and consciousness are neither fettered nor liberated.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs med pa'i phyir gzugs de ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs med pa'i phyir gzugs de ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, form is neither fettered nor liberated because it is non-existent.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa de ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa de ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Feeling, perception, volitional formations, and consciousness are neither fettered nor liberated because they are non-existent.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, form is neither fettered nor liberated because it is isolated.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Feeling, perception, volitional formations, and consciousness are neither fettered nor liberated because they are isolated.

original: gzugs ma skyes pa'i phyir gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: gzugs ma skyes pa'i phyir gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Form is neither fettered nor liberated because it is unborn.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa'i phyir /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa'i phyir /
translated: Feeling, perception, volitional formations, and consciousness are neither fettered nor liberated because they are unborn.

original: rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Consciousness is neither bound nor liberated.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, form is neither bound nor liberated.

original: dge ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: dge ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Wholesome feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are neither bound nor liberated.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po mi dge ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po mi dge ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, unwholesome form is neither bound nor liberated.

original: mi dge ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: mi dge ba'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Unwholesome feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are neither bound nor liberated.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po lung du ma bstan pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, neutral form is neither bound nor liberated.

original: lung du ma bstan pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Neutral feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are neither bound nor liberated.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'jig rten pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'jig rten pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, mundane form is neither bound nor liberated.

original: 'jig rten pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Worldly feeling, perception, volitional formations, and consciousness are neither bound nor liberated.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, supramundane form is neither bound nor liberated.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa @211b ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa @211b ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Supramundane feeling, perception, volitional formations, and consciousness are neither bound nor liberated.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po zag pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po zag pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, contaminated form is neither bound nor liberated.

original: zag pa dang bcas pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Contaminated feeling, perception, volitional formations, and consciousness are neither bound nor liberated.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po zag pa med pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po zag pa med pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, uncontaminated form is neither bound nor liberated.

original: zag pa med pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: The uncontaminated feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not bound and are not liberated.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, why is that?

original: gzugs med pa'i phyir gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i phyir gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Because form is non-existent, form is not bound and is not liberated.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Because feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are non-existent, consciousness is not bound and is not liberated.

original: gzugs dben pa'i phyir gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: gzugs dben pa'i phyir gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Because form is isolated, form is not bound and is not liberated.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Because feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are isolated, consciousness is not bound and is not liberated.

original: gzugs ma skyes pa'i phyir gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: gzugs ma skyes pa'i phyir gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Because form is non-arisen, form is not bound and is not liberated.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: because feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness are not produced, consciousness is not bound and is not liberated.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po chos thams cad kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po chos thams cad kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, all dharmas are not bound and are not liberated.

original: med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Because they do not exist, they are not bound and are not liberated.

original: dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Because they are isolated, they are not bound and are not liberated.

original: ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Because they are not produced, they are not bound and are not liberated.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du dben pa'i phyir dang / zhi ba'i phyir dang / stong pa'i phyir dang / mtshan ma med pa'i phyir dang / smon pa med pa'i phyir dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir dang / ma skyes pa'i phyir dang /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du dben pa'i phyir dang / zhi ba'i phyir dang / stong pa'i phyir dang / mtshan ma med pa'i phyir dang / smon pa med pa'i phyir dang / mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir dang / ma skyes pa'i phyir dang /
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, in the same way, because they are isolated, because they are calm, because they are empty, because they are signless, because they are wishless, because they are unconditioned, and because they are not produced, all dharmas are not bound and are not liberated.

original: dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
analyzed: dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
translated: virtuous and nonvirtuous, afflicted and unafflicted, reprehensible and irreproachable, subject to contamination and uncontaminated, mundane and supramundane, and afflicted and purified.

original: zag pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: zag pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Form is neither bound nor liberated.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: gzugs med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because form does not exist.

original: de ltar gzugs de ma bcings ma grol ba'o //🔽tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams kyang de bzhin te /
analyzed: de ltar gzugs de ma bcings ma grol ba'o // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams kyang de bzhin te /
translated: Thus, form is neither bound nor liberated.

original: tshe @212a * //
analyzed: tshe @212a * //
translated: Feeling, notion, co-producing factors, and consciousness are also like this.

original: dang ldan pa gang po nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: dang ldan pa gang po nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, consciousness, whether afflicted or unafflicted, is neither bound nor liberated.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because consciousness does not exist.

original: de ltar na rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar na rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Thus consciousness is neither bound nor liberated.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po chos thams cad kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po chos thams cad kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, all phenomena are also neither bound nor liberated.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: chos thams cad med pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: chos thams cad med pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because all phenomena do not exist.

original: de ltar chos de dag thams cad ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar chos de dag thams cad ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Thus all those phenomena are neither bound nor liberated.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, the perfection of generosity is neither bound nor liberated.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba ste /
translated: The perfection of ethical discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom are neither bound nor liberated.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, the perfection of wisdom is neither bound nor liberated because it does not exist.

original: de bzhin du dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba nas /
analyzed: de bzhin du dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba nas /
translated: In the same way, because of being void, [the five aggregates] are not bound and are not freed.

original: ma skyes pa'i bar gyi phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i bar gyi phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Up to because of not being produced, they are not bound and are not freed.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po nang stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //🔽phyi stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po nang stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o // phyi stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, inner emptiness is not bound and is not freed.🔽Outer emptiness is not bound and is not freed.

original: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Inner and outer emptiness is not bound and is not freed.

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is not bound and is not freed.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, why is that?

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, because of nonexistence, up to the emptiness that is the nonexistence of an intrinsic nature is not bound and is not freed.

original: de bzhin du dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba nas /
analyzed: de bzhin du dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba nas /
translated: In the same way, because of being void, [the five aggregates] are not bound and are not freed.

original: ma skyes pa'i bar gyi phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i bar gyi phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Up to because of not being produced, they are not bound and are not freed.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening are also not bound and are not freed.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, the thirty-seven dharmas on the side of awakening are not bound and are not freed because they do not exist.

original: dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba nas /
analyzed: dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba nas /
translated: They are not bound and are not freed because they are isolated, and so on up to:

original: ma skyes pa'i bar gyi phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i bar gyi phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: they are not bound and are not freed because they do not arise.

original: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Similarly, the ten powers of the tathāgatas, the four fearlessnesses, the four detailed and thorough knowledges, up to and the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not bound and are not freed.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: tshe dang @212b ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang @212b ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, the eighteen distinct attributes of a buddha are not bound and are not freed because they do not exist.

original: de bzhin du dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba nas /
analyzed: de bzhin du dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba nas /
translated: They are not bound and are not freed because they are isolated, and so on up to:

original: ma skyes pa'i bar gyi phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i bar gyi phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: because of non-production, they are neither bound nor liberated.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, even awakening is neither bound nor liberated.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Even the knowledge of all aspects is neither bound nor liberated.

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Even a bodhisattva is neither bound nor liberated.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Because of non-existence, a bodhisattva is neither bound nor liberated.

original: de bzhin du dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba nas /
analyzed: de bzhin du dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba nas /
translated: Similarly, because of being void, they are neither bound nor liberated, and so on up to:

original: ma skyes pa'i bar gyi phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i bar gyi phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: because of non-production, they are neither bound nor liberated.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, even suchness is neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos nges pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'am bcings ma grol ba ste /
analyzed: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos nges pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'am bcings ma grol ba ste /
translated: the unerring thatness, the unaltered thatness, the nature of dharmas, the expanse of reality, the establishment of dharmas, the certification of dharmas, and the very limit of reality are not bound and are not freed.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, up to the very limit of reality is not bound and is not freed because it is nonexistent.

original: de bzhin du dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba nas /
analyzed: de bzhin du dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba nas /
translated: In the same way, it is not bound and is not freed because it is void,

original: ma skyes pa'i bar gyi phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o //🔽tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'dus ma byas kyang ma bcings ma grol ba ste /
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i bar gyi phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o // tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'dus ma byas kyang ma bcings ma grol ba ste /
translated: up to it is not bound and is not freed because it is non-arisen.🔽Venerable Pūrṇa, the unconditioned is not bound and is not freed.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, the unconditioned is not bound and is not freed because it is nonexistent.

original: dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: It is not bound and is not freed because it is void.

original: ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: ma skyes pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: It is not bound and is not freed because it is non-arisen.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo ste /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ma bcings ma grol ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo ste /
translated: “Venerable Pūrṇa, this is the Dharma gateway called ‘Unbound and Unfreed’ of bodhisattva great beings.

original: de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: The perfection of generosity is unbound and unfreed.

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: The perfection of discipline, perfection of patience, perfection of diligence, perfection of concentration, and perfection of wisdom are unbound and unfreed.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Up to omniscience is unbound and unfreed.

original: byang chub sems dpa' ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Bodhisattvas are unbound and unfreed.

original: sangs rgyas ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Buddhas are unbound and unfreed.

original: de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: Suchness is unbound and unfreed.

original: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / @213a * //
analyzed: ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / @213a * //
translated: Nonerroneous suchness, unaltered suchness,

original: chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos nges pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos nges pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: the nature of reality, the expanse of reality, the real nature of reality, the certainty of reality, and the very limit of reality are neither bound nor liberated.

original: 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings ma bcings ma grol ba'o //
translated: The unconditioned expanse is neither bound nor liberated.

original: de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas /
analyzed: de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas /
translated: Abiding in the perfection of generosity that is neither bound nor liberated,

original: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas /
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas /
translated: abiding in the perfection of ethical discipline, the perfection of patient acceptance, the perfection of perseverance, the perfection of meditative concentration, and the perfection of wisdom,

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la gnas /
translated: abiding in the knowledge of all aspects that is neither bound nor liberated,

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i de bzhin nyid la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i de bzhin nyid la gnas /
translated: abiding in suchness that is neither bound nor liberated,

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos kyi dbyings dang / ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos nges pa nyid dang / ma bcings ma grol ba'i yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas /
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos kyi dbyings dang / ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos nges pa nyid dang / ma bcings ma grol ba'i yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas /
translated: He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba'i 'dus ma byas la gnas te /🔽ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do //
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba'i 'dus ma byas la gnas te / ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do //
translated: He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.🔽He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.🔽He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.🔽He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do //
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do //
translated: He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.🔽He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed do //
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed do //
translated: He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.🔽He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.🔽He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.🔽He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.🔽He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.🔽He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.🔽He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos nyan to //
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos nyan to //
translated: He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.🔽He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.🔽He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.🔽He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.🔽He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.🔽He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.🔽He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.🔽He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.🔽He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.🔽He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.🔽He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.🔽He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.🔽He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.🔽He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.🔽He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.🔽He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.🔽He abides in the unconditioned, which is neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That which is neither bound nor liberated is never separate from the Buddhas, the Blessed Ones, who are neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i mngon par shes pa rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That which is neither bound nor liberated is never separate from the superknowledges, which are neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i mig lnga dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i mig lnga dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That which is neither bound nor liberated is never separate from the five eyes, which are neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzugs rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzugs rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That which is neither bound nor liberated is never separate from forms, which are neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That which is neither bound nor liberated is never separate from the meditative stabilities, which are neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgrub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgrub par 'gyur ro //
translated: That which is neither bound nor liberated is the accomplishment of the knowledge of path aspects, which is neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba de @213b ma bcings ma grol ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba de @213b ma bcings ma grol ba'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro //
translated: That which is neither bound nor liberated will fully awaken to unsurpassed and perfect buddhahood in the aspect of omniscience, which is neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ro //
translated: That which is neither bound nor liberated will turn the wheel of Dharma, which is neither bound nor liberated.

original: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu 'god par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ma bcings ma grol ba de ma bcings ma grol ba'i sems can rnams theg pa gsum la rab tu 'god par 'gyur ro //
translated: That which is neither bound nor liberated will establish sentient beings, who are neither bound nor liberated, in the three vehicles.

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma bcings ma grol ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po ma bcings ma grol ba rnams kyis med pa dang / dben pa nas ma skyes pa'i bar nye bar bzung zhing chos thams cad khong du chud par byed do //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma bcings ma grol ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po ma bcings ma grol ba rnams kyis med pa dang / dben pa nas ma skyes pa'i bar nye bar bzung zhing chos thams cad khong du chud par byed do //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, in this way, the bodhisattva mahāsattva, through the six perfections that are neither bound nor liberated, having taken up the absence of existence, isolation, and so on up to non-arising, comprehends all phenomena.”

original: tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma bcings ma grol ba'i theg pa chen po'i go cha bgos par rig pa bya'o zhes bya ba ni zung du 'brel bar 'jug pa'i lam gyi tshogs so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma bcings ma grol ba'i theg pa chen po'i go cha bgos par rig pa bya'o zhes bya ba ni zung du 'brel bar 'jug pa'i lam gyi tshogs so //
translated: Venerable Pūrṇa, it should be known that the bodhisattva mahāsattva who is neither bound nor liberated is the one who has donned the great armor.

original: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
analyzed: de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
translated: Then the venerable Subhūti said to the Blessed One,

original: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang lags /
translated: “Blessed One, what is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva mahāsattvas?

original: bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par rig par bgyi ba lags /🔽theg pa de gang nas byung ba lags /🔽theg pa de gang du gnas par 'gyur ba lags /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs par rig par bgyi ba lags / theg pa de gang nas byung ba lags / theg pa de gang du gnas par 'gyur ba lags /
translated: Blessed One, by what means should it be known that the bodhisattva mahāsattvas have set out in the Great Vehicle?🔽From where does this vehicle emerge?🔽Where will this vehicle come to rest?

original: theg pa de gang zhig tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags /
analyzed: theg pa de gang zhig tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba lags /
translated: Where will this vehicle come from?

original: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: The Blessed One replied to the venerable Subhūti:

original: rab 'byor gang khyod de skad du /
analyzed: rab 'byor gang khyod de skad du /
translated: “Subhūti, you have asked,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen bo gang lags zhes zer ba ni /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen bo gang lags zhes zer ba ni /
translated: ‘What is the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings?’

original: rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ste drug gang zhe na /
analyzed: rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ste drug gang zhe na /
translated: Subhūti, the six perfections are the Great Vehicle of the bodhisattva great beings. What are the six?

original: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //🔽gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags /
analyzed: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o // gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags /
translated: They are the perfection of generosity, the perfection of discipline, the perfection of patience, the perfection of diligence, the perfection of concentration, and the perfection of wisdom.

original: bcom @214a * //
analyzed: bcom @214a * //
translated: ” Subhūti asked, “Blessed One, what is the bodhisattva great beings’ perfection of generosity?”

original: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas don du gnyer ba rnams la sbyin pa 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas don du gnyer ba rnams la sbyin pa 'di lta ste /
translated: “Here, Subhūti, bodhisattva-mahāsattvas, with attention connected with the knowledge of all aspects, give gifts to those who are striving,

original: phyi nang gi dngos po yongs su gtong ste /
analyzed: phyi nang gi dngos po yongs su gtong ste /
translated: giving up inner and outer things.

original: de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo zhing /
analyzed: de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo zhing /
translated: And they make that common to all sentient beings, and they dedicate it to unsurpassed, perfect, complete awakening, using the method of not apprehending anything.

original: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzhan dag kyang de la yang dag par 'god pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gzhan dag kyang de la yang dag par 'god pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: And using the method of not apprehending anything, they establish others in that. This is the bodhisattva-mahāsattvas’ perfection of giving.🔽” Subhūti said,

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags /
translated: “Lord, what is the bodhisattva-mahāsattvas’ perfection of morality?

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: ” The Lord said,🔽“Here, Subhūti, bodhisattva-mahāsattvas, using the method of not apprehending anything, are endowed with the morality of the bodhisattva-mahāsattvas.

original: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing gnas la /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing gnas la /
translated: Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings, with the thought that is the union of the knowledge of all aspects, themselves take up and maintain the ten wholesome actions,

original: sems can pha rol yang /
analyzed: sems can pha rol yang /
translated: and they also establish other sentient beings

original: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par rab tu 'god pa 'di ni /
analyzed: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par rab tu 'god pa 'di ni /
translated: in the ten wholesome actions, without apprehending them.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'o //
translated: This is the bodhisattva great beings’ perfection of morality that is not grasped as highest.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags /
translated: Śāriputra said, “Lord, what is the bodhisattva great beings’ perfection of patience?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas bdag kyang bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin la /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas bdag kyang bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin la /
translated: Subhūti, here, bodhisattva great beings, with the thought that is the thought of awakening connected with the knowledge of all aspects, are themselves perfect in patience,

original: gzhan yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa la yang dag par rab tu 'god pa 'di ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa la yang dag par rab tu 'god pa 'di ni /
translated: and they also establish others in patience, by way of not apprehending anything.

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: This is the perfection of patience of bodhisattva great beings.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags /
translated: Śāriputra said, “Lord, what is the perfection of perseverance of bodhisattva great beings?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas bdag kyang pha rol @214b tu phyin pa drug la brtson pa ma 'dor zhing gzhan yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mi dmigs
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas bdag kyang pha rol @214b tu phyin pa drug la brtson pa ma 'dor zhing gzhan yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la mi dmigs
translated: Subhūti, here, bodhisattva great beings, with the thought of awakening connected with the knowledge of all aspects, themselves not abandoning the practice of the six perfections, and also establishing others in the six perfections,

original: pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par 'god pa 'di ni /
analyzed: pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par 'god pa 'di ni /
translated: without taking them as a basis,

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: this is the bodhisattva great beings’ perfection of perseverance.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags /
translated: Śāriputra said, “Lord, what is the bodhisattva great beings’ perfection of concentration?”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Lord said,

original: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas /
translated: “Subhūti, here, bodhisattva great beings, with the thought of awakening connected with the knowledge of all aspects,

original: bdag nyid bsam gtan rnams la thabs mkhas pas mnyam par gzhog kyang de dag gi dbang gis mi skye zhing /
analyzed: bdag nyid bsam gtan rnams la thabs mkhas pas mnyam par gzhog kyang de dag gi dbang gis mi skye zhing /
translated: and though they are skilled in the meditative stabilizations, they do not take birth through their power.

original: gzhan yang bsam gtan rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par 'god pa 'di ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang bsam gtan rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par 'god pa 'di ni /
translated: Moreover, they perfectly establish others in the meditative stabilizations without taking them as a basis—

original: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
translated: this is the bodhisattva great beings’ perfection of meditative stabilization.

original: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags /🔽bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
translated: Śāriputra said, “Lord, what is the bodhisattva great beings’ perfection of wisdom?”

original: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas /
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas /
translated: The Lord said, “Subhūti, here bodhisattva great beings, with the thought of awakening connected with the knowledge of all aspects,

original: bdag kyang chos thams cad la mngon par zhen par mi byed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la so sor rtog par byed cing /
analyzed: bdag kyang chos thams cad la mngon par zhen par mi byed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la so sor rtog par byed cing /
translated: do not settle down on any dharma at all, and they investigate the intrinsic nature of all dharmas.

original: sems can rnams kyang chos thams cad la mngon par zhen par mi byed pa dang // chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis /
analyzed: sems can rnams kyang chos thams cad la mngon par zhen par mi byed pa dang // chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtogs par bya ba la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis /
translated: and also to establish sentient beings in the non-apprehension of all phenomena, and to make them realize the nature of all phenomena,

original: yang dag par rab tu 'god pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: yang dag par rab tu 'god pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: this is the perfection of wisdom of bodhisattva great beings.

original: de ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni thabs la mkhas pa'i tshogs so //
analyzed: de ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni thabs la mkhas pa'i tshogs so //
translated: This, Subhūti, is the bodhisattva great beings’ great vehicle.

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the bodhisattva great beings’ great vehicle is this:🔽inner emptiness, outer emptiness, inner and outer emptiness,🔽the emptiness of emptiness, great emptiness,🔽ultimate emptiness,🔽conditioned emptiness,

original: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /
translated: unconditioned emptiness,

original: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / @215a * //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / @215a * //
translated: emptiness of the extreme,🔽emptiness of what is beginningless and endless,🔽emptiness of non-rejection,🔽emptiness of inherent existence,🔽emptiness of all things,

original: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
analyzed: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
translated: emptiness of intrinsic characteristics,🔽emptiness of non-apprehension,🔽emptiness of essential nature,🔽emptiness of existence,🔽emptiness of non-existence,🔽emptiness of intrinsic identity,

original: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang gi ngo bo stong pa nyid dang / gzhan gyi ngo bo stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang gi ngo bo stong pa nyid dang / gzhan gyi ngo bo stong pa nyid do //
translated: and emptiness of other identity.

original: de la nang stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la nang stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: What is inner emptiness?

original: nang gi chos zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: nang gi chos zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The so-called inner phenomena are

original: mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la brjod do //
analyzed: mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la brjod do //
translated: the eyes, ears, nose, tongue, body, and mind.

original: de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir mig ni mig gis stong ngo //
analyzed: de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir mig ni mig gis stong ngo //
translated: The eye is empty of the eye because it is neither permanent nor destroyed.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that is its nature.

original: ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir rna ba ni rna bas stong ngo //
analyzed: ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir rna ba ni rna bas stong ngo //
translated: The ear is empty of the ear because it is neither permanent nor destroyed.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that is its nature.

original: sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir yid ni yid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir yid ni yid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The nose, tongue, body, and mind are empty of the mind because they are neither permanent nor destroyed.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that is their nature.

original: 'di ni nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called “the emptiness of internal phenomena.”

original: de la phyi stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la phyi stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the emptiness of external phenomena?”

original: phyi'i chos zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: phyi'i chos zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
translated: External phenomena are said to be

original: gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos rnams la brjod do //
analyzed: gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos rnams la brjod do //
translated: forms, sounds, smells, tastes, textures, and mental phenomena.

original: de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo //
translated: Form is empty of form because it does not endure eternally and it does not disintegrate.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro //🔽de bzhin du ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro // de bzhin du ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir /
translated: Because such is its intrinsic nature.

original: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos chos kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos chos kyis stong ngo //
translated: Similarly, sound, smell, taste, texture, and mental objects are empty of sound, smell, taste, texture, and mental objects because they do not endure eternally and they do not disintegrate.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because such is their intrinsic nature.

original: 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni phyi stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the emptiness of external phenomena.

original: de la phyi nang stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la phyi nang stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the emptiness of external and internal phenomena?”

original: phyi nang gi chos zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: phyi nang gi chos zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
translated: External and internal phenomena are as follows:

original: nang gi skye mched drug dang / phyi'i skye mched drug la brjod do //
analyzed: nang gi skye mched drug dang / phyi'i skye mched drug la brjod do //
translated: the six sense sources that are internal and the six sense sources that are external are called external and internal phenomena.

original: de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir nang gi chos rnams ni phyi'i chos rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir nang gi chos rnams ni phyi'i chos rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: Here, internal phenomena are empty of external phenomena because they do not endure eternally and they do not disintegrate.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that is the nature of those.

original: ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir phyi'i chos rnams ni nang gi chos rnams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir phyi'i chos rnams ni nang gi chos rnams kyis stong ngo //
translated: External phenomena are empty of external phenomena because they do not last forever and they do not perish.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: @215b de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: @215b de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is the nature of those.

original: 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the emptiness of external and internal phenomena.

original: de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the emptiness of emptiness?”

original: ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa'i stong pa nyid des stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do //
analyzed: ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa'i stong pa nyid des stong pa nyid stong pa nyid do //
translated: The emptiness of emptiness is the emptiness of the emptiness of all phenomena because they do not last forever and they do not perish.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is the nature of those.

original: 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the emptiness of emptiness.

original: de la chen po stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chen po stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the emptiness of great extent?”

original: ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir shar phyogs shar phyogs kyis stong /
analyzed: ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir shar phyogs shar phyogs kyis stong /
translated: The east is empty of the east because it does not last forever and it does not perish.

original: lho phyogs lho phyogs kyis stong /🔽nub phyogs nub phyogs kyis stong /
analyzed: lho phyogs lho phyogs kyis stong / nub phyogs nub phyogs kyis stong /
translated: the south is empty of the south,🔽the west is empty of the west,

original: byang phyogs byang phyogs kyis stong /🔽'og gi phyogs 'og gi phyogs kyis stong /🔽steng gi phyogs steng gi phyogs kyis stong /
analyzed: byang phyogs byang phyogs kyis stong / 'og gi phyogs 'og gi phyogs kyis stong / steng gi phyogs steng gi phyogs kyis stong /
translated: the north is empty of the north,🔽the nadir is empty of the nadir,🔽the zenith is empty of the zenith,

original: phyogs mtshams phyogs mtshams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: phyogs mtshams phyogs mtshams kyis stong ngo //
translated: and the intermediate directions are empty of the intermediate directions.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is their nature.

original: 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni chen po stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the emptiness of the great.

original: de la don dam pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la don dam pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the emptiness of the ultimate?

original: don dam pa zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa la brjod do //
analyzed: don dam pa zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa la brjod do //
translated: The ultimate is said to be nirvana.

original: de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa de yang mya ngan las 'das pas stong ngo //
analyzed: de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa de yang mya ngan las 'das pas stong ngo //
translated: And that nirvana is empty of nirvana because it is not something that endures permanently and is not something that is destroyed.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is its nature.

original: 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the emptiness of the ultimate.

original: de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: What is the emptiness of the conditioned?

original: 'dus byas zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la brjod do //
analyzed: 'dus byas zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams la brjod do //
translated: The conditioned is said to be the desire realm, the form realm, and the formless realm.

original: de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams 'dod pa'i khams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams 'dod pa'i khams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The desire realm is empty of the desire realm because it does not endure permanently and it is not annihilated.

original: gzugs kyi khams gzugs kyi khams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams gzugs kyi khams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The form realm is empty of the form realm.
