original: gzugs med pa'i khams gzugs med pa'i khams kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams gzugs med pa'i khams kyis stong ngo //
translated: The formless realm is empty of the formless realm.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is their nature.

original: 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the emptiness of the conditioned.

original: de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: What is the emptiness of the unconditioned?

original: 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba ni gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur pa med pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas zhes brjod do //
analyzed: 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba ni gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur pa med pa 'di ni 'dus ma byas zhes brjod do //
translated: The unconditioned is said to be that which has no arising, no cessation, and no abiding.

original: de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas ni 'dus ma byas kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas ni 'dus ma byas kyis stong ngo //
translated: Because it does not endure permanently and it does not perish, the unconditioned is empty of the unconditioned.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽de'i rang bzhin @216a * //
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / de'i rang bzhin @216a * //
translated: Why is that?

original: de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is its nature.

original: 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called “emptiness of the unconditioned. ”

original: de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the emptiness of what transcends limits?

original: gang la mtha' mi dmigs pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa zhes brjod do //
analyzed: gang la mtha' mi dmigs pa 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa zhes brjod do //
translated: That which is not observed as a limit is said to be ‘beyond limits. ’

original: de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir mtha' las 'das pa mtha' las 'das pas stong ngo //
analyzed: de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir mtha' las 'das pa mtha' las 'das pas stong ngo //
translated: Because it does not endure permanently and it does not perish, what transcends limits is empty of what transcends limits.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is its nature.

original: 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called “emptiness of what transcends limits. ”

original: de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the emptiness of no beginning and no end?

original: gang la thog ma dang tha ma mi dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: gang la thog ma dang tha ma mi dmigs pa ste /
translated: That which is not observed as a beginning or an end

original: de la dbus med do //
analyzed: de la dbus med do //
translated: has no middle.

original: gang la thog ma med cing dbus med la tha ma mi dmigs pa de la 'gro ba mi dmigs 'ong ba yang mi dmigs te /
analyzed: gang la thog ma med cing dbus med la tha ma mi dmigs pa de la 'gro ba mi dmigs 'ong ba yang mi dmigs te /
translated: That which has no beginning, no middle, and no end is not perceived to come or go.

original: ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma med pa thog ma dang tha ma med pas stong ngo //
analyzed: ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir thog ma dang tha ma med pa thog ma dang tha ma med pas stong ngo //
translated: Because it does not endure permanently and is not annihilated, the beginningless and endless is empty of the beginningless and endless.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is its nature.

original: 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called “the emptiness of the beginningless and endless.”

original: de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the emptiness of non-apprehension?

original: chos gang la yang dor ba med pa ste /
analyzed: chos gang la yang dor ba med pa ste /
translated: There is no apprehension of any dharma at all.

original: dor ba zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: dor ba zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Apprehension is

original: dor ba dang / spangs pa dang btang ba'o //
analyzed: dor ba dang / spangs pa dang btang ba'o //
translated: abandonment, relinquishment, and letting go.

original: de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir dor ba med pa dor ba med pas stong ngo //
analyzed: de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir dor ba med pa dor ba med pas stong ngo //
translated: Because it does not endure permanently and is not annihilated, non-apprehension is empty of non-apprehension.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is its nature.

original: 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dor ba med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called “emptiness of non-rejection. ”

original: de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the emptiness of intrinsic nature?

original: 'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas kyang rung ste /
analyzed: 'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas kyang rung ste /
translated: All conditioned and unconditioned phenomena

original: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni nyan thos rnams kyis ma byas /
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni nyan thos rnams kyis ma byas /
translated: have an intrinsic nature that has not been created by the hearers,

original: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas /
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas /
translated: not created by the pratyekabuddhas,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas te /
translated: and not created by the tathāgatas, arhats, genuinely perfect buddhas.

original: de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir rang bzhin rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir rang bzhin rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: The intrinsic nature is empty of the intrinsic nature because it is neither stable nor destroyed.

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: If you ask why, it is because that is the intrinsic nature of the intrinsic nature.

original: 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called “the emptiness of intrinsic nature. ”

original: de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the emptiness of all things?

original: chos thams cad ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad ces bya ba ni /
translated: All things refers to

original: gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / @216b yid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang /
analyzed: gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / @216b yid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang /
translated: forms, sounds, smells, tastes,🔽tactile objects, and mental phenomena;

original: ro dang / reg dang / chos dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /
analyzed: ro dang / reg dang / chos dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang /
translated: the eye consciousness, ear consciousness, nose consciousness, tongue consciousness, body consciousness, and mind consciousness;🔽eye contact, ear contact, nose contact, tongue contact, body contact, and mind contact; the feeling that arises from the condition of eye contact,

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /
translated: the feeling that arises from the condition of ear contact, the feeling that arises from the condition of nose contact, the feeling that arises from the condition of tongue contact, the feeling that arises from the condition of body contact, and the feeling that arises from the condition of mind contact;

original: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /
analyzed: rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang /
translated: the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the ear, the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the nose, the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the tongue, the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the body, and the feeling that arises from the condition of the contact of the mind.

original: gzugs yod pa'i chos dang / gzugs med pa'i chos dang / 'dus byas kyi chos dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos te /
analyzed: gzugs yod pa'i chos dang / gzugs med pa'i chos dang / 'dus byas kyi chos dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos te /
translated: the form aggregate, the formless aggregate, the conditioned aggregate, and the unconditioned aggregate.

original: 'di dag ni chos thams cad ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di dag ni chos thams cad ces bya'o //
translated: These are called all dharmas.

original: de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad chos thams cad kyis stong ngo //
translated: “Here, all dharmas are empty of all dharmas because they do not endure and they do not disintegrate.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is their nature.

original: 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the emptiness of all dharmas.

original: de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the emptiness of its own mark?

original: gzugs ni 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: gzugs ni 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: Form has the characteristic of being destroyed.

original: tshor ba ni myong ba'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: tshor ba ni myong ba'i mtshan nyid /
translated: Feeling has the characteristic of experience.

original: 'du shes ni 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: 'du shes ni 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: Perception has the characteristic of apprehending.

original: 'du byed ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: 'du byed ni mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: Formation has the characteristic of forming.

original: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: Consciousness has the characteristic of being conscious.

original: de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa'i chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo //
analyzed: de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir 'dus byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa'i chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo //
translated: The characteristics of conditioned phenomena and the characteristics of unconditioned phenomena are empty of the characteristics of conditioned and unconditioned phenomena, because they do not remain the same and they do not disintegrate.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de dag gi rang bzhin ni de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de dag gi rang bzhin ni de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is their nature.

original: 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the emptiness of defining characteristics.

original: de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the emptiness of non-apprehension?

original: gang la 'das pa mi dmigs pa dang / ma 'ongs pa mi dmigs pa dang / de ltar byung ba mi dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: gang la 'das pa mi dmigs pa dang / ma 'ongs pa mi dmigs pa dang / de ltar byung ba mi dmigs pa ste /
translated: the past is not observed, the future is not observed, and the present is not observed.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽'das pa la ma 'ongs pa mi dmigs /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'das pa la ma 'ongs pa mi dmigs /
translated: Why is that?🔽The future is not observed in the past.

original: ma 'ongs pa la 'das pa mi dmigs /🔽de ltar byung ba la yang @217a * //🔽'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa mi dmigs /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa la 'das pa mi dmigs / de ltar byung ba la yang @217a * // 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa mi dmigs /
translated: The past is not observed in the future.🔽The future is not observed in the present.🔽The past and the future are not observed in the present.

original: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag la de ltar byung ba mi dmigs so //
analyzed: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dag la de ltar byung ba mi dmigs so //
translated: The present is not observed in the past and the future.

original: ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa de dag ni mi dmigs pas stong ngo //
analyzed: ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa de dag ni mi dmigs pas stong ngo //
translated: Those non-observations are empty of non-observation because they are not permanent, not annihilated, and so on.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is their nature.

original: 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the emptiness of non-observation.

original: de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities?

original: sbyor ba las byung ba'i chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sbyor ba las byung ba'i chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The essential nature of conditioned phenomena does not exist.

original: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are dependently arisen.

original: ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir sbyor ba ni sbyor bas stong ngo //
analyzed: ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir sbyor ba ni sbyor bas stong ngo //
translated: Application is empty of application because it does not endure permanently and it is not annihilated.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is its nature.

original: 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o /🔽// / bam po bcu drug pa /
analyzed: 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o / // / bam po bcu drug pa /
translated: This is called the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: de la dngos po stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dngos po stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: What is the emptiness of entities?

original: dngos po zhes bya ba ni nye bar len pa po'i phung po la brjod do //
analyzed: dngos po zhes bya ba ni nye bar len pa po'i phung po la brjod do //
translated: An entity is said to be the appropriating aggregates.

original: ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir dngos po de yang dngos pos stong ngo //
analyzed: ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir dngos po de yang dngos pos stong ngo //
translated: That entity is empty of an entity because it does not endure permanently and it is not annihilated.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is its nature.

original: 'di ni dngos po stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dngos po stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the emptiness of entities.

original: de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: What is the emptiness of non-entities?

original: dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas la brjod do //
analyzed: dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas la brjod do //
translated: A non-entity is said to be unconditioned.

original: ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa de yang dngos po med pas stong ngo //
analyzed: ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa de yang dngos po med pas stong ngo //
translated: That non-entity is empty of that non-entity, because it is not permanent, not destroyed.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is its nature.

original: 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni dngos po med pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the emptiness of non-entities.

original: de la rang gi ngo bo stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rang gi ngo bo stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the emptiness of its own mark?

original: rang gi ngo bo ni shes pa dang mthong bas ma byas pa'i phyir na phyin ci ma log pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo ni shes pa dang mthong bas ma byas pa'i phyir na phyin ci ma log pa'i rang bzhin no //
translated: The own-mark is not made by consciousness or seeing, and is not inverted.

original: ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir rang gi ngo bo ni rang gi ngo bos stong ngo //
analyzed: ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir rang gi ngo bo ni rang gi ngo bos stong ngo //
translated: The own-mark is empty of the own-mark, because it is not permanent, not destroyed.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is its nature.

original: 'di ni rang gi ngo bo stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni rang gi ngo bo stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the emptiness of its own mark.

original: de la gzhan gyi ngo bo stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la gzhan gyi ngo bo stong pa nyid gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the emptiness of the own-being of non-entities?

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung ste /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung ste /
translated: Whether the Tathāgatas arise or not,

original: chos rnams kyi chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos nges pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa 'di ni gnas pa nyid de gzhan gyis @217b ma byas so //
analyzed: chos rnams kyi chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos nges pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa 'di ni gnas pa nyid de gzhan gyis @217b ma byas so //
translated: This is the stability of the nature of phenomena, the dharma-element, the certainty of the dharma, thusness, unaltered thusness, and the very limit of reality. It is not made by anyone.

original: ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir de ni des stong ngo //
analyzed: ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir de ni des stong ngo //
translated: It is empty of that, because it is not stable and does not disintegrate.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: And why?

original: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because that is its nature.

original: 'di ni gzhan gyi ngo bo stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni gzhan gyi ngo bo stong pa nyid ces bya'o //
translated: This is called the emptiness of the essential nature of non-entities.

original: rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi tshogs so //
analyzed: rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni ye shes kyi tshogs so //
translated: “Subhūti, this is the Bodhisattva great beings’ Great Vehicle.”

original: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste /
translated: “Furthermore, Subhūti, the Bodhisattva great beings’ Great Vehicle is this.

original: dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called Heroic Progress, the samadhi called Jewel Seal, the samadhi called Lion’s Play, the samadhi called Good Moon,

original: zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called Moon Banner Peak, the samadhi called Exalted Above All Dharmas, the samadhi called Looking at the Crown, the samadhi called Ascertained in the Dharmadhatu,

original: nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la 'thug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la 'thug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samādhi called Banner of Certainty, the samādhi called Vajra, the samādhi called Seal of the Profundity of All Dharmas, the samādhi called Abiding Like the King of Samādhis,

original: 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samādhi called Radiating Light Rays, the samādhi called Array of Armies, the samādhi called Noble, the samādhi called Unfailing Engagement with Terms,

original: tshig bla dags la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyams pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /🔽chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: tshig bla dags la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyams pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzi brjid dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samādhi called Entering into the True Name, the samādhi called Looking in All Directions, the samādhi called Holding the Seal, the samādhi called Unfailing,🔽the samādhi called the Seal of the Ocean of the True Assembly of All Dharmas, the samādhi called Filling the Expanse of Space, the samādhi called Vajra Maṇḍala, the samādhi called Endowed with Brilliance,

original: tshad med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chags pa dang sgrib pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi 'jug pa chad @218a * //
analyzed: tshad med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chags pa dang sgrib pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi 'jug pa chad @218a * //
translated: the samādhi called Illuminating Immeasurably, the samādhi called Free from Attachment and Obstruction, the samādhi called the Cessation of the Engagement of All Dharmas,

original: pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la brten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la brten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called Abandoning Afflictions, the samadhi called Illuminating, the samadhi called Non-Seeking, the samadhi called Not Relying on Abodes,

original: sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called No Mind, the samadhi called Stainless Lamp, the samadhi called Infinite Light, the samadhi called Light Maker, the samadhi called Universal Illumination,

original: dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /🔽zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called Pure Holiness, the samadhi called Stainless Light, the samadhi called Causing Delight, the samadhi called Lightning Lamp,🔽the samadhi called Inexhaustible, the samadhi called Unmoving, the samadhi called Non-Destruction, the samadhi called Sun Lamp, the samadhi called Stainless Moon,

original: dag par rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: dag par rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called Pure Appearance, the samadhi called Illuminator, the samadhi called Doing What is to be Done, the samadhi called Wisdom Peak,

original: rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / legs par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / legs par rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the vajra-like samadhi, the mind-dwelling samadhi, the all-illuminating samadhi, the well-established samadhi,

original: rin chen mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: rin chen mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the infinite jewel samadhi, the sublime dharma mudra samadhi, the sameness of all phenomena samadhi, the abandoning of joy samadhi,

original: chos thams cad 'phags pas khengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge rnam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad 'phags pas khengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge rnam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the meditative absorption of the noble one’s pride in all phenomena, the meditative absorption of total dispersal, the meditative absorption of discerning the words of all phenomena, the meditative absorption of the arrangement of syllables,

original: yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the meditative absorption of freedom from syllables, the meditative absorption of cutting through reference points, the meditative absorption of immutability, the meditative absorption of non-aspect,

original: ming dang @218b mtshan ma med pa la 'jug pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab rib dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: ming dang @218b mtshan ma med pa la 'jug pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab rib dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called Non-engagement in Names and Signs, the samadhi called Conduct Without a Basis, the samadhi called Free from Obscuration, the samadhi called Endowed with Conduct,

original: spyod pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yul las brgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: spyod pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yul las brgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called Without Conduct, the samadhi called Beyond Objects, the samadhi called Accumulation of All Qualities, the samadhi called Abiding Without Mind,

original: dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called Blossoming and Increasing the Flower of Virtue, the samadhi called Endowed with the Branches of Awakening, the samadhi called Infinite Eloquence, the samadhi called Equal to the Unequalled,

original: chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called Transcending All Dharmas, the samadhi called Thoroughly Cutting Through, the samadhi called Dispelling Doubt, the samadhi called Without a Basis,

original: gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called Single Array, the samadhi called Manifesting Forms, the samadhi called Becoming One, the samadhi called Non-Elimination,

original: rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: rtogs pas srid pa'i gzhi thams cad khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brda dang sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called Understanding the Basis of Existence through Realization, the samadhi called Engaging in Symbols and Sounds, the samadhi called Free from Syllables of Sound and Melody,

original: sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the blazing lamp meditative stabilization, the thorough refinement of characteristics meditative stabilization, the non-apprehending meditative stabilization, the endowed with all supreme aspects meditative stabilization,

original: bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the non-delight in all happiness and suffering meditative stabilization, the inexhaustible treasure-house meditative stabilization, the dhāraṇī intelligence meditative stabilization,

original: yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gal pa dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mthun @219a * //
analyzed: yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gal pa dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mthun @219a * //
translated: the thoroughly clearing away all right and wrong meditative stabilization, the pacifying all conflict and cessation meditative stabilization, the concordant

original: pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med par rgyas pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called Non-contradiction, the samadhi called Stainless Light, the samadhi called Endowed with Essence, the samadhi called Light of the Stainless Full Moon,

original: bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the samadhi called Great Array, the samadhi called Illuminating All Aspects, the samadhi called Equality of Samadhi, the samadhi called Endowed with the Way of Being Free from and Beyond Dust,

original: nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa thams cad nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par gzhol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas dmigs su med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the meditative absorption of correct engagement without afflictive emotion, the meditative absorption of correct engagement without afflictive emotion of all those with afflictive emotions, the meditative absorption of diligence in the non-apprehending of a location,

original: de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' lhar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
analyzed: de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' lhar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
translated: the meditative absorption of abiding in suchness without mind, the meditative absorption of the body that is the elimination of faults, the meditative absorption of the sky that is the destruction of the faults of speech,

original: nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: and the meditative absorption of the sky-like freedom from attachment, liberation, and stains.

original: de la dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “Among them, what is the heroic progress meditative absorption?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang gis ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod yul la spyod pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang gis ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod yul la spyod pa ste /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization by means of which one practices the domain of all meditative stabilizations.

original: 'di ni dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the heroic stride meditative stabilization.

original: de la rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the precious seal meditative stabilization?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang gis ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyas btab pa lta bur gyur pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang gis ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyas btab pa lta bur gyur pa ste /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization by means of which all meditative stabilizations are sealed.

original: 'di ni rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the precious seal meditative stabilization.

original: de la seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the lion’s play meditative stabilization?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rnam par rtse ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rnam par rtse ba ste /
translated: It is the meditative stabilization standing in which one plays with all meditative stabilizations.

original: 'di ni seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the lion’s play meditative stabilization.

original: de la zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the good moon meditative stabilization?

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed pa ste /

analyzed: 'di ni zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the “excellent moon” samādhi.

analyzed: de la zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin de ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa ste /

analyzed: 'di ni zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces @219b bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //

analyzed: de la chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi mngon par 'phags pa ste /

analyzed: 'di ni chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the ‘superior to all phenomena’ samādhi.

analyzed: de la spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba ste /

analyzed: 'di ni spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //

analyzed: 'di ni chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: “The bodhisattva who is skilled in the meditative absorption of wishlessness is skilled in all meditative absorptions.”

analyzed: de la nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: The Sūtra on the Inconceivable Secret (Acintya-guhya-sūtra) says,🔽“The bodhisattva who is skilled in the meditative absorption of emptiness is skilled in all meditative absorptions.”🔽The Sūtra on the Inconceivable Secret (Acintya-guhya-sūtra) says,

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan nges par 'dzin pa ste /

original: 'di ni nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: The Sūtra on the Inconceivable Secret (Acintya-guhya-sūtra) says,🔽“The bodhisattva who is skilled in the meditative absorption of wishlessness is skilled in all meditative absorptions.”🔽The Sūtra on the Inconceivable Secret (Acintya-guhya-sūtra) says,

analyzed: de la rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis 'jig par mi 'gyur ba ste /

analyzed: 'di ni rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //

analyzed: de la chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya la 'jug pa ste /

analyzed: 'di ni chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //

analyzed: de la ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na /

analyzed: 'di ni ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //

analyzed: de la 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa ste /

analyzed: 'di ni 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //

analyzed: de la dpung rtsam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi stobs rnam par bkod pa ste /

analyzed: de la yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad yang dag par 'phags par 'gyur pa ste /

analyzed: 'di ni yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //

analyzed: de la nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi nges pa'i tshig bstan pa la 'jug pa ste /

analyzed: 'di na nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //

analyzed: de la tshig bla dags la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi tshig bla dags la 'jug pa ste /

analyzed: 'di ni tshig bla dags la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //

analyzed: de la phyogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi phyogs la rnam par lta ba ste /

analyzed: 'di ni phyogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //

analyzed: de la phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ste /

analyzed: 'di ni phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the mudrā-holding samādhi.

original: de la nyams pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la nyams pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the uncorrupted samādhi?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad mnyam par mi 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad mnyam par mi 'gyur ba ste /
translated: The samādhi abiding in which does not corrupt all samādhis.

original: 'di ni nyams pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni nyams pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the uncorrupted samādhi.

original: de la chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called the seal of the ocean of the true gathering of all phenomena?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'du zhing khong du chud par 'dod pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'du zhing khong du chud par 'dod pa ste /
translated: It is the samādhi standing in which they wish to gather and comprehend all samādhis.

original: 'di ni chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the samādhi called the seal of the ocean of the true gathering of all phenomena.

original: de la nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called filling space?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa ste /
translated: It is the samādhi standing in which they fill all space with all samādhis.

analyzed: 'di ni nam @220b mkha' rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the samādhi called filling space.

original: de la rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su 'dzin pa ste /
translated: It is a samādhi in which one holds the maṇḍala of all samādhis.

original: 'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the vajra maṇḍala samādhi.

original: de la gzi brjid dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la gzi brjid dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad gzi brjid dang blos 'bar par byed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad gzi brjid dang blos 'bar par byed pa ste /

analyzed: 'di ni gzi brjid dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the blazing splendor samādhi.

original: de la tshad med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la tshad med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the infinite light samādhi?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad tshad med par snang ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad tshad med par snang ba ste /
translated: It is a samādhi in which all samādhis appear as infinite light.

original: 'di ni tshad med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni tshad med par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the infinite light samādhi.

original: de la chags pa dang sgrib pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la chags pa dang sgrib pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the unattached and unobstructed samādhi?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing chags pa thams cad dang bral ba nyid la brten nas ting nge 'dzin thams cad sgrib pa med par snang ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing chags pa thams cad dang bral ba nyid la brten nas ting nge 'dzin thams cad sgrib pa med par snang ste /
translated: The concentration in which all concentrations appear without obscuration, in dependence on freedom from all attachment.

original: 'di ni chags pa dang sgrib pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni chags pa dang sgrib pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: The samādhi in which all attachments are eliminated is called the samādhi of the absence of attachment.

original: de la chos thams cad kyi 'jug pa chad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /🔽ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing chos thams cad la 'jug pa yang dag par gcod pa ste /
analyzed: de la chos thams cad kyi 'jug pa chad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing chos thams cad la 'jug pa yang dag par gcod pa ste /
translated: What is the samādhi of the cessation of all phenomena?

original: 'di ni chos thams cad la 'jug pa chad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni chos thams cad la 'jug pa chad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: The samādhi in which all phenomena are completely stopped is called the samādhi of the cessation of all phenomena.🔽What is the samādhi of the cutting off of all engagement?🔽The samādhi in which all phenomena are engaged is called the samādhi of the cutting off of all engagement.

original: de la nyon mongs pa sdong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /🔽ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri ma rab tu sel ba ste /
analyzed: de la nyon mongs pa sdong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi dri ma rab tu sel ba ste /
translated: What is the samādhi of the uprooting of afflictions?

original: 'di ni nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni nyon mongs pa spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: The samādhi in which all afflictions are completely eliminated is called the samādhi of the uprooting of afflictions.

original: de la rnam par snang byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rnam par snang byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: What is the vairocana samādhi?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad lham me lta na ni lhang nger byed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad lham me lta na ni lhang nger byed pa ste /
translated: It is the samādhi in which all samādhis are illuminated and shine.

original: 'di ni rnam par snang byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni rnam par snang byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the vairocana samādhi.

original: de la tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: What is the aniketa samādhi?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing chos gang la yang tshol ba med pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing chos gang la yang tshol ba med pa ste /
translated: It is the samādhi in which one does not seek any dharma.

original: 'di ni tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the aniketa samādhi.

original: de la gnas la brten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la gnas la brten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: What is the aniketacārin samādhi?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing chos gang yang gnas la brten par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /🔽'di ni gnas la brten pa med pa @221a * //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing chos gang yang gnas la brten par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste / 'di ni gnas la brten pa med pa @221a * //
translated: It is the samādhi in which one does not see any dharma as a basis.

original: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the aniketacārin samādhi.

original: de la sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: What is the samādhi called “no mind”?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing sems mi 'byung sems las byung ba rnams kyang mi rgyu ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing sems mi 'byung sems las byung ba rnams kyang mi rgyu ba ste /
translated: It is the samādhi standing in which the mind does not arise and mental factors do not occur.

original: 'di ni sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the samādhi called “no mind.”

original: de la dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: What is the samādhi called “stainless lamp”?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgron ma dri ma med par byed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgron ma dri ma med par byed pa ste /
translated: It is the samādhi standing in which the lamp of all samādhis is made stainless.

original: 'di ni dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the samādhi called “stainless lamp.”

original: de la 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: What is the samādhi called “infinite light”?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing 'od mtha' yas par byed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing 'od mtha' yas par byed pa ste /
translated: It is the samādhi standing in which infinite light is made.

original: 'di ni 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the samādhi called “infinite light.”

original: de la 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: What is the samādhi called “light-maker”?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin 'di thob ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od byed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin 'di thob ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od byed pa ste /
translated: It is the samādhi endowed with which bodhisattvas illuminate all the buddhafields.

original: 'di ni 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
analyzed: 'di ni 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
translated: This is the illuminating samādhi.

original: de la kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the all-illuminating samādhi?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste /
translated: It is the samādhi endowed with which bodhisattvas illuminate the doors of all the samādhis.

original: 'di ni kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the all-illuminating samādhi.

original: de la dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the sublime illumination samādhi?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dag pa mnyam pa nyid thob pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dag pa mnyam pa nyid thob pa ste /
translated: It is the samādhi endowed with which bodhisattvas attain the equality of the purity of all the samādhis.

original: 'di ni dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the sublime illumination samādhi.

original: de la 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the stainless light samādhi?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dri ma sel ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dri ma sel ba ste /
translated: It is the samādhi in which all the defilements of the mind are purified.🔽This is the samādhi called ‘purifying the field.’🔽“What is the samādhi called ‘purifying the torch’?🔽It is the samādhi in which all the defilements of the mind are purified.🔽This is the samādhi called ‘purifying the torch.’🔽“What is the samādhi called ‘purifying the immaculate’?🔽It is the samādhi in which all the defilements of the mind are purified.

original: 'di ni 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the samādhi called ‘purifying the immaculate.’

original: de la dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called ‘producing joy’?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dga' ba nyams su myang bar 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dga' ba nyams su myang bar 'gyur ba ste /

original: 'di ni dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the samādhi called ‘producing joy.’

original: de la glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgron ma byed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgron ma byed pa ste /

original: 'di ni glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the samādhi called ‘lightning flash.’

original: de la zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called ‘inexhaustible’?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad zad mi shes par @221b yang dag par rjes su mthong nas chos rdul tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad zad mi shes par @221b yang dag par rjes su mthong nas chos rdul tsam yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste /
translated: The samādhi called Inexhaustible Light.

original: 'di ni zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: The samādhi called Inexhaustible.🔽The samādhi called Unmoving.🔽The samādhi called Non-destruction.🔽The samādhi called Non-abiding.🔽The samādhi called Non-differentiation.

original: de la mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: The samādhi called Non-attachment.🔽The samādhi called Non-distortion.🔽The samādhi called Non-regression.🔽The samādhi called Non-forgetfulness.🔽The samādhi called Non-delusion.🔽The samādhi called Non-obscuration.

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad mi g-yo mi 'gul rab tu mi 'byed rlom sems su mi byed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad mi g-yo mi 'gul rab tu mi 'byed rlom sems su mi byed pa ste /
translated: The samādhi called Non-disturbance.🔽The samādhi called Non-attachment to the world.🔽The samādhi called Non-attachment to the three realms.

original: 'di ni mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: The samādhi called Non-attachment to the three times.🔽The samādhi called Non-attachment to the three vehicles.

original: de la 'jig pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'jig pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: The samādhi called Non-attachment to the three turnings.🔽The samādhi called Non-attachment to the three turnings.🔽The samādhi called Non-attachment to the three turnings.🔽The samādhi called Non-attachment to the three turnings.

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig pa med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'jig pa med par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste /
translated: The samādhi called Non-attachment to the three turnings.🔽The samādhi called Non-attachment to the three turnings.🔽The samādhi called Non-attachment to the three turnings.🔽The samādhi called Non-attachment to the three turnings.🔽The samādhi called Non-attachment to the three turnings.🔽The samādhi called Non-attachment to the three turnings.🔽The samādhi called Non-attachment to the three turnings.🔽The samādhi called Non-attachment to the three turnings.🔽The samādhi called Non-attachment to the three turnings.🔽The samādhi called Non-attachment to the three turnings.🔽The samādhi called Non-attachment to the three turnings.🔽The samādhi called Non-attachment to the three turnings.🔽The samādhi called Non-attachment to the three turnings.🔽The samādhi called Non-attachment to the three turnings.🔽The samādhi called Non-attachment to the three turnings.🔽The samādhi called Non-attachment to the three turnings.

original: 'di ni 'jig pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni 'jig pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: The samādhi called Non-attachment to the three turnings.🔽The samādhi called Non

original: de la nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the sūrya-pradīpa samādhi?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste /
translated: It is the samādhi standing in which he illuminates the door of all samādhis.

original: 'di ni nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the sūrya-pradīpa samādhi.

original: de la zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the candra-vimala samādhi?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad mun pa med par byed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad mun pa med par byed pa ste /
translated: It is the samādhi standing in which he makes all samādhis free from darkness.

original: 'di ni zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the candra-vimala samādhi.

original: de la dag par rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la dag par rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the śuddha-prabhāsa samādhi?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rab tu thong pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rab tu thong pa ste /
translated: It is the samādhi standing in which he attains the four analytical knowledges in all samādhis.

original: 'di ni dag par rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni dag par rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the śuddha-prabhāsa samādhi.

original: de la snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called illuminating?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa ste /
translated: It is the samādhi standing in which they illuminate the door of all samādhis.

original: 'di ni snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the samādhi called illuminating.

original: de la bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called performing function?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi bya ba rnams byed pa ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi bya ba rnams byed pa ste /
translated: It is the samādhi standing in which they perform the function of all samādhis.

original: 'di ni bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the samādhi called performing function.

original: de la ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: “What is the samādhi called the banner of knowledge?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes tog yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi ye shes tog yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste /
translated: It is the samādhi standing in which they see the banner of knowledge of all samādhis.

original: 'di ni ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the samādhi called the banner of knowledge.

original: de la rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: What is the vajra-like meditative stabilization?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad nges par 'jig cing ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad nges par 'jig cing ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste /
translated: It is that meditative stabilization standing in which one definitely destroys all meditative stabilizations and does not see even meditative stabilization.

original: 'di ni rdo rje lta bu @222a * //🔽zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //🔽de la sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'di ni rdo rje lta bu @222a * // zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to // de la sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: This is the vajra-like meditative stabilization.🔽What is the mind-resting meditative stabilization?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing sems mi g-yo //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing sems mi g-yo //
translated: It is that meditative stabilization standing in which the mind does not move,

original: rnam par mi g-yo //
analyzed: rnam par mi g-yo //
translated: does not move in various ways,

original: rnam par mi ldog / yongs su yi chad par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: rnam par mi ldog / yongs su yi chad par mi 'gyur /
translated: does not turn back, does not become discouraged,

original: nyams su mi bde ba med pa de la sems zhes bya ba 'di yin zhes bya bar sems mi 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: nyams su mi bde ba med pa de la sems zhes bya ba 'di yin zhes bya bar sems mi 'byung ba ste /
translated: and does not become unhappy, and in which the thought “This is the mind resting” does not occur.

original: 'di ni sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: 'di ni sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the mind-resting meditative stabilization.

original: de la kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
translated: What is the universal radiance meditative stabilization?

original: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas shing ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar yang dag par rjes su mthong ba ste /
translated: The samadhi in which one sees all samadhis as illuminated

original: 'di ni kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to /
analyzed: 'di ni kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to /
translated: is the samadhi called Universal Illumination.
